anya-e1101n:1170_0: Evaṃ vadantā pana te ubhopi amhākaṃ devo uttamo amhākaṃ devo uttamoti kalahaṃ vaḍḍhetvā rañño santikamagamaṃsu,
anya-e1101n:1170_1: rājā tesaṃ kathaṃ sutvā tenahi tumhākaṃ devatānaṃ mahantabhāvaṃ iddhipāṭihāriyena jānissāma.
anya-e1101n:1170_2: Dassetha tehi no iddhiṃti nagare bheriṃ carāpesi.
anya-e1101n:1170_3: Ito kira sattāhaccayena imesaṃ dvinnaṃ satthārānaṃ pāṭihāriyāni bhavissanti.
anya-e1101n:1170_4: Sabbe sannipatantūti taṃ sutvā nānādisāsu bahū manussā samāgamiṃsu,
anya-e1101n:1170_5: atha micchādiṭṭhikā ajja amhākaṃ devassa ānubhāvaṃ passāmāti mahantaṃ pūjaṃ karonto tattha sāraṃ nāddasaṃsu,
anya-e1101n:1170_6: sammādiṭṭhikāpi ajja amhākaṃ bhagavato ānubhāvaṃ passissāmāti vāḷukāthūpaṃ gantvā gandhamālādīhi pūjetvā padakkhiṇaṃ katvā añjalimpaggayha aṭṭhaṃsu.
anya-e1101n:1170_8: Nānāsamayavādinopi ajja tesaṃ pāṭihāriyaṃ passissāmāti mañcātimañcaṃ katvā aṭṭhaṃsu.
anya-e1101n:1170_9: Tesaṃ samāgame sammādiṭṭhikā vāḷukāthūpa mabhimukhaṃ katvā añjalimpaggayha sāmi amhākaṃ bhagavā sabbabuddhakiccāni
anya-e1101n:1170_12: natthettha amhākaṃ aññaṃ paṭisaraṇanti vatvā saccakiriyaṃ karontā āhaṃsu.

anya-e1101n:1205_0: Evañca pana vatvā upāsakā amhākaṃ anukammaṃ paṭicca mahājanassa micchādiṭṭhibhedanattaṃ pāṭihāriyaṃ dassetha sāmīti ārādhesuṃ.
anya-e1101n:1205_1: Atha buddhānubhāvañca therānubhāvañca upāsakānaṃ saccakiriyānubhāvañca paṭicca vāḷukāthūpaṃ dvidhā bhinditvā
anya-e1101n:1205_2: pādapīṭhadhātu ākāsa mabbhuggantvā chabbaṇṇaraṃsiyo vissajjentī vilāsamānā aṭṭhāsi.
anya-e1101n:1205_3: Atha mahājanā celukkhepasahassāni pavattentā sādhukīḷhaṃ kīḷantā mahānādaṃ pavattentā mahantaṃ pūjamakaṃsu.
anya-e1101n:1205_4: Micchādiṭṭhikāpi imaṃ acchariyaṃ disvā vimhitamānasā micchādiṭṭhiṃ bhinditvā ratanattayaparāyaṇā saraṇa magamaṃsūti.
anya-e1101n:1213_0: So kira purimabuddhesu purimabuddhe itisabbattha katādhikāro tattha tattha bhave vivaṭṭūpanissayaṃ puññaṃ
anya-e1101n:1213_1: upacinanto sumedhassa bhagavato kāle vijjādharo hutvā himavati paṭivasati.
anya-e1101n:1213_2: Tadā sumedho nāma sammāsambuddho viveka manubrūhanto himavantaṃ gantvā ramaṇīye padese pallaṅkaṃ ābhujitvā nisīdi.
anya-e1101n:1213_3: Tadā vijjādharo ākāsena gacchanto chabbaṇṇaraṃsīhi virājamānaṃ bhagavantaṃ disvā tīhi kaṇikārapupphehi pūjesi,
anya-e1101n:1213_4: pupphāni buddhānubhāvena satthu upari chattākārena aṭṭhaṃsu,
anya-e1101n:1213_5: so tena bhīyyoso mattāya pasannacitto hutvā aparabhāge kālaṃkatvā tāvatiṃsabhavane nibbattitvā uḷāraṃ
anya-e1101n:1213_6: dibbasampattimanubhavanto yāvatāyukaṃ tattha ṭhatvā tato cuto devamanussesu saṃsaranto imasmiṃ buddhuppāde
anya-e1101n:1213_9: So uttamarūpadharo viññutaṃ patto brāhmaṇavijjāsu nipphattiṃ patvā jātiyā rūpena vijjāya sīlācārena ca lokassa mahanīyo jāto,
anya-e1101n:1213_10: tassa taṃ paññāsampattiṃdisvā vassakāro magadhamahāmatto attano dhītaraṃ dātukāmo hutvā attano adhippāyaṃ pavedesi.
anya-e1101n:1213_11: So nissaraṇajjhāsayatāya taṃ paṭikkhipitvā kālenakālaṃ dhammasenāpatiṃ payirupāsanto tassa santike dhammaṃ
anya-e1101n:1213_12: sutvā paṭiladdhasaddho pabbajitvā vattasampanno hutvā theraṃ upaṭṭhahati.
anya-e1101n:1213_13: Tena ca samayena therassa aññataro ābādho uppanno hoti,
anya-e1101n:1213_14: tassa bhesajjatthāya uttarasāmaṇero pātova pattacīvara mādāya vihārato nikkhamma antarāmagge taḷākassa
anya-e1101n:1213_15: tīre pattaṃ ṭhapetvā udakasamīpaṃ gantvā mukhaṃ dhovati,
anya-e1101n:1213_16: tadā aññataro ummaggacoro katakammo ārakkhapurisehi anubaddho aggadvāreneva nagarato nikkhamitvā palāyanto
anya-e1101n:1213_17: attanā gahitaṃ ratanabhaṇḍikaṃ sāmaṇerassa patte pakkhipitvā palāyi.
anya-e1101n:1213_18: So sāmaṇeropi pattasamīpaṃ sattusamīpaṃ itipi katthaci upagato hoti,
anya-e1101n:1213_19: coraṃ anubandhantā rājapurisā sāmaṇerassa patte bhaṇḍikaṃ disvā ayaṃ coro,
anya-e1101n:1213_20: iminā coriyaṃ katanti sāmaṇeraṃ pacchābāhaṃ bandhitvā vassakārassa brāhmaṇassa dassesuṃ.
anya-e1101n:1213_21: Vassakāro ca tadā rañño vinicchaye niyutto hutvā chejjabhejjaṃ anusāsati.
anya-e1101n:1213_22: So eso pubbe mama vacanaṃ nādiyi.
anya-e1101n:1213_23: Suddhapāsaṇḍiyesu pabbajīti ca baddhāghātattā taṃ kammaṃ asodhetvāva jīvantamevetaṃ sūle uttāsethāti āṇā pesi,
anya-e1101n:1213_25: Sāmaṇero sūlagge nisinno upajjhāyassa me ko bhesajjaṃ āharissatīti sāriputtattheraṃ sari.
anya-e1101n:1213_26: Tato thero taṃ pavattiṃ ñatvā sammāsambuddhassa kathesi,
anya-e1101n:1213_27: bhagavāpi mahāsāvakaparivuto tassa ñāṇaparipākaṃ oloketvā taṃ ṭhānamagamāsi.
anya-e1101n:1213_28: Tato bhagavato nikkhantabhāvā sakalanagare kolāhalaṃ ahosi,
anya-e1101n:1213_31: jālāvaguṇṭhitamudutalunaṅgulaṃ hatthaṃ uttarassa sīse ṭhapetvā uttara idaṃ te pubbe katapāpakammassa
anya-e1101n:1213_33: tattha tayā paccavekkhaṇabalena adhivāsanā kātabbāti āha.
anya-e1101n:1215_0: Atīte kira ekasmiṃ, gāme tva masi dārako;
anya-e1101n:1218_0: Gahetvā sukhumaṃ sūkaṃ, tadā tvaṃ nimbajalliyā;
anya-e1101n:1221_0: Aparampi te pāpakammaṃ, pavakkhāmi suṇohi me;
anya-e1101n:1228_0: Ayaṃ te carimā jāti, etthāpica vipacci soti.
anya-e1101n:1229_0: Evamādinā nayena tassa ajjhāsayānurūpena dhammaṃ desesi,
anya-e1101n:1229_1: uttaro amatābhisekasadisena satthuno hatthasamphassasañjātapasādasomanassatāya uḷāraṃ pītipāmojjaṃ paṭilabhitvā
anya-e1101n:1229_2: yathāparicitaṃ vipassanāmaggaṃ samārūḷho ñāṇassa paripākaṃ gatattā satthu desanāvilāsena maggapaṭipāṭiyā
anya-e1101n:1229_4: Dhammaṃ sutvā tattha samāgatānaṃ devamanussānaṃ caturāsītipāṇasahassānaṃ dhammābhisamayo ahosīti vadanti.
anya-e1101n:1229_5: Uttaro pana chaḷabhiñño hutvā sūlato uṭṭhahitvā ākāse ṭhatvā pāṭihāriyaṃ dassesi.
anya-e1101n:1229_8: so bhikkhūhi āvuso tādisaṃ dukkhaṃ anubhavanto kathaṃ tvaṃ vipassanaṃ anuyuñjituṃ sakkhīti puṭṭho pageva
anya-e1101n:1229_9: me āvuso saṃsāre ādīnavo saṅkhārānañca sabhāvo sudiṭṭho.
anya-e1101n:1229_10: Tasmāhaṃ tādisaṃ dukkhaṃ anubhavantopi asakkhiṃ vipassanaṃ vaḍḍhetvā visesaṃ adhigantuṃti āha.
anya-e1101n:1229_11: Athāparabhāge so bhikkhusaṅghamajjhe attano pubbacaritā padānaṃ pakāsento imā gāthā abhāsi.
anya-e1101n:1238_0: Tisūlaṃ sukataṃ gayha, gacchāmi ambare tadā.
anya-e1101n:1249_0: Buddhassa ānubhāvena, tīṇi pupphāni me tadā;
anya-e1101n:1255_0: Tattha me sukataṃ byamhaṃ, kaṇikārīti ñāyati;
anya-e1101n:1276_0: Tattha naccehi gītehi, tālehi vāditehi ca;
anya-e1101n:1279_0: Tattha bhutvā ca pitvā ca, modāmi tidase tadā;
anya-e1101n:1287_0: Bhoge me ūnatā natthi, buddhapūjāyi daṃ phalaṃ.
anya-e1101n:1289_0: Dve me bhave saṃsarāmi, devatte atha mānuse;
anya-e1101n:1290_0: Aññaṃ gatiṃ na jānāmi, buddhapūjāyidaṃ phalaṃ.
anya-e1101n:1292_0: Dve me kule pajānāmi, khattiye cāpi brāhmaṇe;
anya-e1101n:1293_0: Nīce kule na jānāmi, buddhapūjāyidaṃ phalaṃ.
anya-e1101n:1299_0: Labhāmi sabba meve taṃ, buddhapūjāyidaṃ phalaṃ.
anya-e1101n:1307_0: Imaṃ khāda imaṃ bhuñja, imamhi sayane saya;
anya-e1101n:1310_0: Sabbattha pūjito homi, yaso accuggato mama;
anya-e1101n:1314_0: Sītaṃ uṇhaṃ na jānāmi, pariḷāho na vijjati;
anya-e1101n:1315_0: Atho cetasikaṃ dukkhaṃ, hadaye me na vijjati.
anya-e1101n:1338_0: Kilesā jhāpitā mayhaṃ, bhavā sabbe samūhatā;
anya-e1101n:1341_0: Svāgataṃ vata me āsi, buddhaseṭṭhassa santikaṃ;
anya-e1101n:1342_0: Tisso vijjā anuppatto, kataṃ buddhassa sāsanaṃ.
anya-e1101n:1344_0: Paṭisambhidā catasso ca, vimekkhā pica aṭṭhime;
anya-e1101n:1354_0: Jambudīpe kira coḷaraṭṭhe kāvīrapaṭṭanaṃ nāma ahosi.
anya-e1101n:1354_2: Tatthekasmiṃ devālaye cittakammaṃ karontā ekasmiṃ phalake issarassa onamitvā vandanākāraṃ bhagavato rūpaṃ akaṃsu.
anya-e1101n:1354_3: Tasmiṃ samaye tattha bahū upāsakā taṃ devakulaṃ gantvā tattha tattha cittakammāni olokentā tasmiṃ phalake taṃ cittakammaṃ addasaṃsu.
anya-e1101n:1354_4: Disvāna te aho amhehi apassitabbaṃ passitaṃ.
anya-e1101n:1354_5: Sadevake loke samārake sabrahmake sassamaṇabrāhmaṇiyāsadevamanussāya pajāya ca aparimāṇesu cakkavāḷesu
anya-e1101n:1354_8: Ananurūpaṃ tassa etehi kataṃti rodantā paridevantā rājadvāraṃ gantvā ugghosesuṃ,
anya-e1101n:1354_9: taṃ sutvā rājā te pakkosāpetvā kasmā tumhe ugghosethāti pucchi,
anya-e1101n:1354_11: Deva amhākaṃ bhagavā devātidevo sakkātisakko brahmātibrahmā meruva acalo sāgaro gambhīro ākāsova ananto
anya-e1101n:1386_0: Satthā no bhagavā deva, mahābrahmehi vandito;
anya-e1101n:1389_0: Sabbesu cakkavāḷesu, ye aggā ye ca pūjitā;
anya-e1101n:1391_1: Taṃ sutvā rājā bho sabbepi manussā attano attano devatānaṃ mahantabhāvaṃ kathenti.
anya-e1101n:1391_2: Tumhākaṃ pana satthuno mahantabhāvaṃ kathaṃ amhākaṃ jānāpethāti,
anya-e1101n:1391_3: upāsakā na garu tvaṃ mahārāja phalakaṃ āharāpetvā suddhavatthena veṭhetvā taṃ attano muddikāya lañchitvā
anya-e1101n:1391_4: surakkhitasugopite ekasmiṃ devakule ṭhapetvā sattāhaccayena āharāpetvā taṃ oloketha,
anya-e1101n:1391_5: tadā no satthuno mahantānubhāvaṃ jānāthāti āhaṃsu,
anya-e1101n:1391_6: atha rājā tesaṃ vuttaniyāmeneva kārāpetvā antodevakule ṭhapetvā sabbadvārāni pidahitvā lañchetvā rakkheyyāthāti niyojesi.
anya-e1101n:1391_7: Tato te upāsakā sabbe sannipatitvā sattāhaṃ dānaṃ dentā sīlaṃ rakkhantā uposathakammaṃ karontā sabbasattesu
anya-e1101n:1391_8: mettiṃ bhāventā sabbasattānaṃ attanā katapuññesu pattiṃ dentā tiṇṇaṃ ratanānaṃ pūjaṃ karontā evaṃ ugghosesuṃ.
anya-e1101n:1391_9: Amhākaṃ katakusalanissandena loke mahiddhikā mahānubhāvā sabbe devā ca lokaṃ pālentā cattāro mahārājāno
anya-e1101n:1391_10: ca amhākaṃ satthuno upaṭṭhānāya upaṭṭhāya itisabbattha ṭhitabhāvaṃ dassentūti saccakiriyaṃ akaṃsu.
anya-e1101n:1391_11: Atha tesaṃ puññānubhāvena tasmiṃ khaṇe sakkassa devarañño paṇḍukambalasilāsanaṃ uṇhākāraṃ dassesi.
anya-e1101n:1391_12: Tato so manussalokaṃ olokento micchādiṭṭhīhi kataṃ taṃ vippakāraṃ disvā saṃviggo āgantvā issaraṃ bhagavato
anya-e1101n:1391_13: pāde vanditvā sayitākāraṃ katvā taṃ pavattiṃ upāsakānaṃ kathetvā sakaṭṭhānameva agamāsi.
anya-e1101n:1391_14: Tato sattame divasepātova te sabbepi rañño santikaṃ gantvā vanditvā evamāhaṃsu.
anya-e1101n:1391_15: Deva issaro amhākaṃ bhagavato pāde sirasā vanditvā nipannoti.
anya-e1101n:1391_16: Atha rājā tesaṃ kathaṃ sutvā nagare bheriṃ carāpetvā mahājane sannipātetvā tehi parivuto devakulaṃ gantvā
anya-e1101n:1391_17: lañchaṃ bhindāpetvā dvāraṃ vivaritvā phalakaṃ āharāpetvā veṭhitasāṭake mocāpesi.
anya-e1101n:1391_18: Atha rājā ca mahājano ca taṃ mahantaṃ pāṭihāriyaṃ disvā micchādiṭṭhiṃ pahāya sabbe satthuno saraṇa magamaṃsu.
anya-e1101n:1391_19: Atha rājā taṃ devakulaṃ bhindāpetvā mahantaṃ ramaṇīyaṃ vihāraṃ kārāpetvā yāvajīvaṃ puññakammaṃ katvā devaloke nibbatti.
anya-e1101n:1399_0: Ekasmiṃ kira samaye amhākaṃ bhagavā sāvatthiyaṃ upanissāya jetavane viharati dhammadesanāya mahājanassa saggamokkhasampadaṃ dadamāno.
anya-e1101n:1399_1: Tasmiṃsamaye pañcasatā corā aṭavito nagaraṃ āgantvā rattibhāge corakammaṃ katvā tena puttadāre posenti.
anya-e1101n:1399_2: Athekadivasaṃ corā corakammatthāya nagaraṃ pavisantā nagaradvāre ekaṃ dukkhitaṃ janapadamanussaṃ passitvā hambho kattha vasatīti pucchiṃsu,
anya-e1101n:1399_4: Athassa te kasmā bho iminā dukkhavāsena vasissasi,
anya-e1101n:1399_5: ehi amhehi saddhiṃ corakammaṃ karonto vatthālaṅkārasampanno puttadāraṃ posehi.
anya-e1101n:1399_7: So panime yuttaṃ kathentīti tesaṃ vacanaṃ sampaṭicchi.
anya-e1101n:1399_8: Atha te evaṃ sati amhehi saddhiṃ āgacchāhīti vatvā naṃ gahetvā antonagaraṃ paviṭṭhā tattha tattha vilumpantā corakammaṃ akaṃsu.
anya-e1101n:1399_9: Tadā jānapadiko laddhavibhavo imameva varataranti tehi saddhiṃ corakammaṃ karonto jīvikaṃ kappesi,
anya-e1101n:1399_10: athekadivasaṃ rājapurisā katakamme te sabbeva gahetvā pacchābāhaṃ gāḷhaṃ bandhitvā kosalarañño dassesuṃ,
anya-e1101n:1399_12: bhaṇe tumhākaṃ antare yo etesaṃ māretvā jīvitakkhayaṃ pāpessati,
anya-e1101n:1399_14: taṃ sutvā te corā sabbe aññamaññañātisuhadasambandhabhāvena taṃ na icchiṃsu.
anya-e1101n:1399_15: So pana janapadavāsī manusso ahamete sabbe māressāmīti rañño vatvā tenānuññāto te sabbe māresi.
anya-e1101n:1399_16: Taṃ disvā tuṭṭho rājā tassa coraghātakammaṃ adāsi.
anya-e1101n:1399_17: So core ca vajjhappatte ca mārento pañcavīsativassāni vasanto aparabhāge mahallako ahosi.
anya-e1101n:1399_18: Atha so mandabalattā katipayapahārenāpi coraṃ māretuṃ na sakkoti,
anya-e1101n:1399_19: rājā taṃ ñatvā aññassa coraghātakammaṃ adāsi.
anya-e1101n:1399_20: Atha so coraghātakammā coraghātakamma itipikatthaci parihīno attano gehe vasati.
anya-e1101n:1399_21: Tadā aññataro manusso mantaṃ parivattetvā nāsāvātena manussamāraṇakamantaṃ jānāti.
anya-e1101n:1399_22: Tathāhi hatthapādakaṇṇanāsasīsādīsu yaṃkiñci chejjabhejjaṃ kattukāmo mantaṃ parivattetvā nāsāvātaṃ vissajjeti.
anya-e1101n:1399_25: atha so taṃ purisaṃ upaṭṭhahitvā mantaṃ labhitvā rañño sāsanaṃ pesesi.
anya-e1101n:1399_26: Ahaṃ ito pubbe mahallakattā corānaṃ hatthapādādayo dukkhena chejja bhejjaṃ karomi,
anya-e1101n:1399_30: Rājā taṃ sāsanaṃ sutvā sādhūti taṃ pakkosāpetvā ṭhānantaraṃ tasseva pākatika makāsi.
anya-e1101n:1399_31: So tato paṭṭhāya taṃ kammaṃ karonto puna pañcavassāni atikkāmesi.
anya-e1101n:1399_32: So mahallako khīṇāyuko dubbalo maraṇamañcaparāyaṇo hutvā maraṇavedanādukkhena mahantena bhayānakena saddena
anya-e1101n:1399_33: vissaraṃ viravanto nimīlitena cakkhunā bhayānakaṃ narakaggijālāpajjalantaayakūṭamuggaradhare nirayapāle
anya-e1101n:1399_35: tato tassa paṭivissakagehe manussā tassa bhayānakasaddasavaṇena gehaṃ chaṭṭetvā palāyiṃsu.
anya-e1101n:1399_36: Tasmiṃ kira divase mahāsāriputtatthero dibbacakkhunā lokaṃ olokentā taṃ coraghātakaṃ tadaheva kālaṃkatvā
anya-e1101n:1399_37: niraye nibbattamānaṃ disvā mayi tattha gate panesa mayi pasādena sagge nibbattatīti ñatvā ajja mayā tassānuggahaṃ
anya-e1101n:1399_38: kātuṃ vaṭṭatīti pubbaṇhasamayaṃ nivāsetvā tassa gharadvāra magamāsi.
anya-e1101n:1399_39: Atha so theraṃ disvā kuddho kopena taṭataṭāyamānadeho ajja taṃ vijjhitvā phāletvā māressāmīti nipannova mantaṃ parivattetvā nāsāvātaṃ vissajjesi,
anya-e1101n:1399_40: thero tasmiṃ khaṇe nirodhasamāpanno nirodhā vuṭṭhāya suriyo viya virocamāno aṭṭhāsi,
anya-e1101n:1399_41: atha so therassa tayo vāre tatheva katvā kiñci kātuṃ asakkonto ativiya vimhitacitto there cittaṃ pasādetvā attano paṭiyattaṃ pāyasaṃ therassa dāpesi,
anya-e1101n:1399_43: coraghātako therassa dinnadānaṃ anussaranto tasmiṃ khaṇe kālaṃ katvā sagge nibbatti.
anya-e1101n:1399_45: Evaṃ narake nibbattamānopissa balena sagge nibbattoti. Tathāhi.
anya-e1101n:1402_0: Dānaṃ saggassa sopānaṃ, dānaṃ santikaraṃ paraṃ.
anya-e1101n:1410_0: Pāpakammesu nirato, ṭhitoyaṃ narakāyane narakāvane itipikatthaci;
anya-e1101n:1416_0: Tasmā sukhette saddhāya, detha dānāni kāmadaṃ;
anya-e1101n:1417_0: Dānaṃ dentehi sīlampi, pālanīyaṃtisundaranti pālanaṃcātisundaraṃ itipikatthaci.
anya-e1101n:1418_0: Atha bhikkhū dhammasabhāyaṃ sannipatitvā nisinnā bhagavantaṃ pucchiṃsu,
anya-e1101n:1418_1: kiṃbhante so pāpo catūsu apāyesu katarasmiṃ nibbattoti.
anya-e1101n:1418_2: Atha satthā ajjesa bhikkhave sāriputtassa dinnadānānubhāvena devaloke nibbatto,
anya-e1101n:1418_3: tasseva nissandena anāgate paccekabuddho bhavissatīti byākāsīti.
anya-e1101n:1426_0: Atīte kira kassapadasabalassa kāle eko puriso saddho ratanattayesu pasanno ucchuyantakammena jīvikaṃ kappento paṭivasati.
anya-e1101n:1426_1: Atha so ekaṃ gilānabhikkhuṃ disvā tassa uḷuṅkamattaṃ sappiṃ adāsi,
anya-e1101n:1426_3: athāparasmiṃdivase ekaṃ chātajjhattaṃ sunakhaṃ disvā tassa bhattapiṇḍena saṅgaha makāsi,
anya-e1101n:1426_5: athekadivasaṃ dhammaṃ suṇamāno dhammadesakassa bhikkhussa sāṭakaṃ pūjesi,
anya-e1101n:1426_6: so ettakaṃ puññakammaṃ katvā bhavesu caramānohaṃ samuddapabbatādīsupi yaṃ yaṃ icchāmi.
anya-e1101n:1426_8: so aparabhāge kālaṃ katvā teheva kusalamūlehi suttappabuddho viya devaloke nibbattitvā tattha mahantaṃ
anya-e1101n:1426_9: dibbasampattiṃ anubhavitvā tato cuto amhākaṃ bhagavato kāle sāvatthiyaṃ mahaddhane mahāsālakule nibbattitvā
anya-e1101n:1426_10: tato so viññutaṃ patto kālena kālaṃ dhammaṃ suṇanto gharāvāse ādīnavaṃ pabbajjāya ca ānisaṃsaṃ sutvā
anya-e1101n:1426_12: So aparabhāge satthāraṃ vanditvā pañcasatabhikkhuparivāro ugganagaraṃ agamāsi,
anya-e1101n:1426_13: tattha seṭṭhino bhariyā saddhā ahosi pasannā.
anya-e1101n:1426_14: Sā theraṃ pañcahi bhikkhusatehi saddhiṃ bhikkhāya carantaṃ disvā turitaturitā gantvā therassa pattaṃ
anya-e1101n:1426_15: gahetvā saddhiṃ pañcasatehi bhikkhūhi bhojetvā theraṃ tattha nibaddhavāsatthaṃ yācitvā pañcasatakūṭāgārāni
anya-e1101n:1426_16: kārāpetvā alaṅkaritvā pañcasatabhikkhū tattha vāsentī nibaddhaṃ catupaccayehi upaṭṭhānamakāsi.
anya-e1101n:1426_17: Tato thero taṃ pañcasu sīlesu patiṭṭhāpetvā tattha yathābhirantaṃ viharitvā aññatta gantukāmo anupubbena paṭṭanagāmaṃ agamāsi,
anya-e1101n:1426_18: tattha vasitvā tato nāvaṃ abhiruyha pañcasatabhikkhūhi parivuto samuddapiṭṭhena gacchati,
anya-e1101n:1426_19: samuddaṃ tarantassa tassa sāgaramajjhe udaravāto samuṭṭhahitvā pīḷeti,
anya-e1101n:1426_20: taṃ disvā bhikkhū bhante idaṃ pubbe kena vūpasamessatīti pucchiṃsu,
anya-e1101n:1426_21: thero pubbe me āvuso uluṅkamatte sappipīte rogo vūpasammatīti āha,
anya-e1101n:1426_22: bhikkhū bhante samuddapiṭṭhe kathaṃ sappiṃ labhissāma,
anya-e1101n:1426_24: taṃ sutvā therena theronanoāyasmantā itisabbattha na no āyasmantā sappi dullabhā,
anya-e1101n:1426_25: mama pattaṃ gahetvā samuddodakaṃ uddharitvā ānethāti vutte bhikkhū tathā akaṃsu.
anya-e1101n:1426_27: atha bhikkhū taṃ disvā acchariyabbhutacittā jātā therassa sappiṃ upanāmesuṃ,
anya-e1101n:1426_28: therena sappino sappinā itisabbattha pītamatte so ābādho vūpasami,
anya-e1101n:1426_29: athassa bhikkhūhi ki metaṃ bhante acchariyaṃ,
anya-e1101n:1426_30: na no ito pubbe evarūpaṃ diṭṭhapubbaṃti vutte thero tenahi katapuññānaṃ puññavipākaṃ passissathāti vatvā samuddaṃ olokesi idaṃ sappi hotūti.
anya-e1101n:1426_31: Athassa cakkhupathe samudde sabbodakaṃ parivattetvā sappi ahosi.
anya-e1101n:1426_32: Athassa bhikkhū abbhutacittā aññampi īdisaṃ puññaṃ atthi bhanteti pucchiṃsu,
anya-e1101n:1426_33: tato thero tenahi passathāyasmantā mama puññanti vatvā samantā tattha tattha ghanaselapabbate olokesi,
anya-e1101n:1426_35: tato cakkhupathe samantā bhattabhājanāni dassesi sabyañjanaṃ sopakaraṇaṃ.
anya-e1101n:1426_40: bhikkhū taṃ taṃ pāṭihāriyaṃ disvā atīva vimhitā bhante kena te puññakammena etādisāni pāṭihāriyāni bhavissantīti pucchiṃsu,
anya-e1101n:1426_41: thero kassapadasabalassa kāle attanā kataṃ sabbaṃ taṃ kusalaṃ pakāsesi. Tenettha.
anya-e1101n:1428_0: Imasmiṃ bhaddake kappe, kassapo nāma nāyako;
anya-e1101n:1444_0: Taṃ taṃ sabbaṃ ghataṃ hoti, ghatadānassidaṃ phalaṃ.
anya-e1101n:1450_0: Tena so sukhito āsi, rogaṃ byapagataṃ tadā.

anya-e1101n:1513_0: Amhākaṃ bhagavati parinibbute bārāṇasīnagaravāsī eko duggatapuriso paragehe bhatiṃkatvā jīvikaṃ kappeti,

anya-e1101n:1514_4: akatavīriyena taṃ matthakaṃ pāpetuṃ na sakkā,

anya-e1101n:1514_7: samādāpetvā tasmiṃ maṇḍapaṃ kārāpetvā vanakusamādīhi taṃ alaṅkaritvā bhikkhū nimantetvā maṇḍape nisīdāpetvā

anya-e1101n:1514_9: Atha so maraṇakāle attanā kataṃ taṃ dānavaraṃ anussari.
anya-e1101n:1514_10: So tena kusalakammena suttappabuddho viya devaloke nibbatti.
anya-e1101n:1514_11: Tasmiṃ tena katapuññānurūpaṃ mahantaṃ kanakavimānaṃ nibbatti.
anya-e1101n:1514_12: Samantā tigāvutaṭṭhāne devatā nānā vidhāni turiyāni gahetvā upahāraṃ karonti.

anya-e1101n:1514_15: Athekadivasaṃ suvaṇṇaselavihāravāsī mahāsaṅgharakkhitatthero pattapaṭisambhido devacārikaṃ caramāno taṃ

anya-e1101n:1567_0: Evaṃ devaputto attanā katapuññakammaṃ vittārena kathesi,

anya-e1101n:1567_2: Taṃ sutvā mahājano kusalakammaṃ katvā yebhuyyena sagge nibbattoti.
anya-e1101n:1575_0: Ito pubbe nāradassa kira sammāsambuddhassa kāle ayaṃ dīpo aññatarena nāmena pākaṭo ahosi,
anya-e1101n:1575_1: so panekasmiṃ kāle dubbhikkho ahosi dussasso,
anya-e1101n:1575_3: Tasmiṃ samaye nāradassa bhagavato eko sāsaniko sāvako aññatarasmiṃ gāme piṇḍāya caritvā yathā dhotapattova nikkhami.
anya-e1101n:1575_4: Athaññatarasmiṃ gehe manussā ekaṃ taṇḍulanāḷiṃpoṭalikāya bandhitvā udake pakkhipitvā pacitvā udakaṃ gahetvā pivanto jīvanti,
anya-e1101n:1575_5: tadā theraṃ disvā vanditvā pattaṃ gahetvā tena taṇḍulena bhattaṃ pacitvā patte pakkhipitvā therassa adaṃsu.
anya-e1101n:1575_6: Atha tesaṃ saddhābalena sā ukkhali bhattena paripuṇṇā ahosi,
anya-e1101n:1575_7: te taṃ abbhutaṃ disvā ayyassa dinnadāne vipāko ajjeva no diṭṭhoti somanassajātā mahājanaṃ sannipātetvā te bhattaṃ bhojetvā pacchā sayaṃ bhuñjiṃsu.
anya-e1101n:1575_9: Tato paṭṭhāya te sampattamahājanassa dānaṃ dadantā āyupariyosāne devaloke nibbattiṃsu,
anya-e1101n:1575_10: atha so thero bhattaṃ ādāya gantvā aññatarasmiṃ rukkhamūle nisīditvā bhuñjitumārati.
anya-e1101n:1575_11: Tasmiṃ kira rukkhe nibbatto eko devaputto āhārena kilanto bhuñjamānaṃ theraṃ disvā attabhāvaṃ vijahitvā mahallakavesena tassa samīpe aṭṭhāsi.
anya-e1101n:1575_13: Devaputto carimālopaṃ ṭhapetvā bhuttakāle ukkāsitvā attānaṃ ṭhitabhāvaṃ jānāpesi.
anya-e1101n:1575_14: Thero taṃ disvā vippaṭisāri hutvā carimaṃ bhatthapiṇḍaṃ tassa hatthe ṭhapesi,
anya-e1101n:1575_15: tato so bhattapiṇḍaṃ gahetvā ṭhito cintesi.
anya-e1101n:1575_16: Ito kira mayā pubbe samaṇabrāhmaṇānaṃ vā kapaṇaddhikānaṃ vā antamaso kākasunakhā dīnampi āhāraṃ adinnapubbaṃ bhavissati,
anya-e1101n:1575_17: tenavāhaṃ devo hutvāpi bhattaṃ na labhāmi.
anya-e1101n:1575_19: taṃ me bhavissati dīgharattaṃ hitāya sukhāya cāti.
anya-e1101n:1575_20: Evañca pana cintetvā bhattapiṇḍe āsaṃ pahāya theraṃ upasaṅkamma sāmi dāsassa vo alaṃ idha lokena saṅgahaṃ.
anya-e1101n:1575_21: Paralokena me saṅgahaṃ karothāti vatvā tassa patte okiri.
anya-e1101n:1575_22: Athassa bhatthapiṇḍaṃ bhatthapiṇḍaṃ itisabbattha patte patitamatteyeva tigāvutaṭṭhāne dibbamayāni bhattabhājanānipaññāyiṃsu.
anya-e1101n:1575_23: Devaputto theraṃ pañcapatiṭṭhitena vanditvā tato dibbabhojanaṃ gahetvā pathamaṃ dānaṃ datvā pacchā sayaṃ bhuñci.
anya-e1101n:1575_24: Tato deputto dutiyadivasato paṭṭhāya therassa ca sampattamahājanassa ca mahādānaṃ dento āyupariyosāne
anya-e1101n:1575_25: 0 devaloke nibbattitvā chasu kāmasaggesu aparāparaṃ dibbasampatti manubhavamāno padumuttarassa bhagavato
anya-e1101n:1575_26: kāle tato cuto bārāṇasiyaṃ anekavibhavassa micchādiṭṭhikassa kuṭumbikassa gehe nibbatti.
anya-e1101n:1575_28: Aparabhāge viññutaṃ pattassa tassa mātāpitaro kālamakaṃsu.
anya-e1101n:1575_29: Sovaṇṇamaṇimuttādipūritakoṭṭhāgārādayo oloketvā mama mātāpitaro micchādiṭṭhikattā ito dānādikiñcikammaṃ
anya-e1101n:1575_30: akaritvā paralokaṃ gacchantā kākaṇikamattampi agahetvā gatā,
anya-e1101n:1575_31: ahaṃ pana taṃ gahetvāva gamissāmīti sanniṭṭhānaṃ katvā bheriṃ carāpetvā kapaṇaddhikavanibbake sannipātetvā
anya-e1101n:1575_32: sattāhabbhantare sabbaṃ sāpateyyaṃ dānamukhena datvā araññaṃ pavisitvā isippabbajjaṃ pabbajitvā kasiṇaparikammaṃ
anya-e1101n:1575_33: katvā pañca bhiññā aṭṭha samāpattiyo nibbattetvā ākāsacārī ahosi.
anya-e1101n:1575_34: Atha tasmiṃsamaye padumuttaro nāma bhagavā haṃsavatīnagare paṭivasanto devabrahmādiparivuto catusaccapaṭisaṃyuttaṃ dhammaṃ desento nisinno hoti,
anya-e1101n:1575_35: tadā so tāpaso ākāsena gacchanto mahājanasamāgamañca bhagavato sarīrato nikkhantachabbaṇṇaraṃsiyo ca
anya-e1101n:1575_36: disvā kimetaṃti vimhito ākāsā otaritvā mahatiyā buddhalīḷāya nisīditvā dhammaṃ desentaṃ bhagavantaṃ disvā
anya-e1101n:1575_37: pasannamānaso parisantare nisinno dhammaṃ sutvā bhagavantaṃ vanditvā attano assamameva agamāsi.
anya-e1101n:1575_38: Atha so tattha yāvatāyukaṃ ṭhatvā āyupariyosāne tāvatiṃsabhavane nibbatto tiṃsakappe dibbasampattimanubhavanto
anya-e1101n:1575_41: ekakavīsatiattabhāve cakkavatti hutvā manussasampatti manubhavitvā imasmiṃbuddhuppāde bhagavati parinibbute
anya-e1101n:1575_42: sāvatthiyaṃ aññatarasmiṃ kulagehe nibbattitvā sattavassiko ekaṃ bhikkhuṃ dhammaṃ desentaṃ addasa.
anya-e1101n:1575_43: Disvā taṃ upasaṅkamitvā dhammaṃ sutvā aniccasaññaṃ paṭilabhitvā tattha nisinnova arahattaṃ pāpuṇi,
anya-e1101n:1575_44: tato so pattapaṭisambhido attanā katapuññakammaṃ olokento taṃ pubbacariyaṃ bhikkhūnaṃ majjhe pakāsento āha. Tasmā.
anya-e1101n:1577_0: Nārado kira sambuddho, pubbe āsi naruttamo;

anya-e1101n:1634_0: Sudinnaṃ me tadā dānaṃ, sussutaṃ dhammamuttamaṃ;

anya-e1101n:1644_0: Ito kira kappasatasahassamatthake padumuttaro nāma satthā loke udapādi dhammadesanāya satte amatamahānibbāṇaṃ pāpento,
anya-e1101n:1644_1: tasmiṃ samaye bhagavā haṃsāvatiyaṃ sarājikāya parisāya majjhe ekaṃ bhikkhuṃ lābhīnaṃ aggaṭṭhāne ṭhapesi.
anya-e1101n:1644_2: Tadā rājā taṃ disvā taṃ ṭhānaṃ kāmayamāno buddhapamukhassa saṅghassa mahādānaṃ datvā bhagavato pādamūle sirasā nipajji,
anya-e1101n:1644_3: tadāssa bhagavā anāgate gotamassa bhagavato sāsane taṃ ṭhānaṃ labhissasīti vatvā byākāsi.
anya-e1101n:1644_4: Taṃ sutvā mudito rājā puññāni katvā devaloke nibbatti.
anya-e1101n:1644_5: Tato aparabhāge bārāṇasiyaṃ seṭṭhiputto hutvā paccekabuddhasahassaṃ catupaccayadānena yāvajīvaṃ paṭijaggitvā
anya-e1101n:1644_6: devaloke nibbatto mahantaṃ sampatti manubhavitvā tato cuto vipassissa bhagavato kāle bandhumatīnagare
anya-e1101n:1644_8: So tasmiṃ samaye senaguttaṭṭhāne ṭhatvā rañño kammaṃ karoti,
anya-e1101n:1644_9: tadā nagaravāsino upāsakagaṇā vipassīsammāsambuddhaṃ upasaṅkamma vanditvā bhagavā bhante sasāvako amhākaṃ
anya-e1101n:1644_10: anuggahaṃ karotūti svātanāya nimantetvā mahādānaṃ datvā sabbe ekacchandā bhagavanta muddissa mahārahaṃ
anya-e1101n:1644_11: mahāpariveṇaṃ kārāpetvā pariveṇamahe mahādānaṃ dadantā dānagge asukaṃ nāma natthīti na vattabbanti vatvā
anya-e1101n:1644_12: dānaṃ paṭiyādetvā dānaggaṃ olokentā navadadhiñca paṭalamadhuñca apassantā purise pakkositvā sahassaṃ
anya-e1101n:1644_13: datvā dadhimadhuṃ khippaṃ pariyesitvā ānethāti pesesuṃ,
anya-e1101n:1644_14: te sahassaṃ gahetvā dadhimadhuṃ upadhāretuṃ tattha tattha vicarantā dvārantare aṭṭhaṃsu,
anya-e1101n:1644_15: tadā ayaṃ senagutto rañño sabhattaṃ dadhimadhuṃ ādāya gacchanto mahādvāraṃ sampāpuṇi,
anya-e1101n:1644_16: atha te dadhimadhuṃ disvā bho kahāpaṇaṃ gahetvā imaṃ dehīti yāciṃsu.
anya-e1101n:1644_17: Tena tenadassāmi itipikattaci na dassāmīti vutte yāvasahassaṃ vaḍḍhetvā yāciṃsu.
anya-e1101n:1644_18: Tato senagutto imaṃ appagghaṃ sahassena yācatha,
anya-e1101n:1644_20: tehi sambuddhatthāyāti vutte tenahi ahameva dassāmīti jīramaricādīhi sakkharamadhuphāṇitādayo yojetvā dānaggaṃ upanāmesi.
anya-e1101n:1644_21: Taṃ satthu ānubhāvena buddhapamukhassa aṭṭhasaṭṭhibhikkhusatasahassassa pahoṇakaṃ ahosi.
anya-e1101n:1644_22: Tato so tena puññakammena devamanussalokesu sampatti manubhavitvā aparabhāge amhākaṃ bhagavato kāle koliyanagare
anya-e1101n:1644_23: mahālilicchavirañño upanissāya suppiyāya nāma aggamahesiyā kucchismiṃ paṭisandhiṃ gaṇhi.
anya-e1101n:1644_24: So sattamāsasattasaṃvaccharāni mātukucchiyaṃ vasitvā sattadivasāni mūḷhagabbho dukkhamanubhavi.
anya-e1101n:1644_25: Mātukucchito nikkhamantassa tassa mātāpitaro sīvalīti nāma makaṃsu.
anya-e1101n:1644_26: Evaṃ mahāpuññassa ettakaṃ kālaṃ mātukucchimhi dukkhānubhavanaṃ attanāva katena pāpabalena ahosi,
anya-e1101n:1644_27: so kira atīte rājā hutvā attano sapattaraññā saddhiṃ saṅgāmento mātarā saddhiṃ mantesi.
anya-e1101n:1644_28: Sā nagaraṃ rundhitvā amitte gaṇhituṃ sakkāti upāya madāsi,
anya-e1101n:1644_29: sopi tassā vacanena nagaraṃ rundhitvā sattame divase aggahesi,
anya-e1101n:1644_30: tena pāpakammabalena mātāputtānaṃ evaṃ mahantaṃ dukkhaṃ ahosīti.
anya-e1101n:1644_31: Tato sā puttaṃ vijāyanakāle sattame divase bhagavantaṃ anussaritvā sukhena bhāraṃ muñci.
anya-e1101n:1644_32: Tuṭṭhā sā sattame divase buddhapamukhassa bhikkhusaṅghassa mahādānaṃ adāsi,
anya-e1101n:1644_33: athassā putto sattavassikakāle gehā nikkhamma satthāraṃ disvā pabbajjaṃ yāci.
anya-e1101n:1644_35: tato sāriputtattherena upajjhāyena moggallānamācariyaṃ katvā pabbaji,
anya-e1101n:1644_36: atha so khuraggeyeva arahattaṃ patvā buddhasāsanaṃ sobhesi,
anya-e1101n:1644_37: so pubbe katapuññānubhāvena mahāpuñño ahosi lābhīnañca aggo.
anya-e1101n:1644_38: Athekasmiṃ samaye bhagavā revatattheraṃ dassanāya khadiravanavihāraṃ gacchanto tiṃsabhikkhusahassehi
anya-e1101n:1644_39: saddhiṃ tiṃsayojanikaṃ chaṭṭitakantāraṃ sampāpuṇi nirūdakaṃ appabhakkhaṃ.
anya-e1101n:1644_41: Tasmā bhagavā sīvalittheraṃ purato cārikaṃ katvā devatāhi kārāpite vihāre vasanto devatāhi sajjitadānaṃ
anya-e1101n:1644_42: paribhuñjanto revatattheraṃ saṃpāpuṇitvā gatakammaṃ niṭṭhāpetvā jetavanamāgamma lābhīnaṃ aggaṭṭhāne taṃ
anya-e1101n:1649_0: Sīlaṃ tassa asaṅkhyeyyaṃ, samādhi vajirūpamo vajirūpamā itikatthaci;
anya-e1101n:1658_0: Tadāhaṃ khattiyo āsiṃ, pure haṃsavatīvhaye haṃsāvatavhaye itisabbattha;
anya-e1101n:1659_0: Sutvā jinassa taṃ vākyaṃ, sāvakassa guṇaṃ bahuṃ.
anya-e1101n:1664_0: Tadā maṃ vinataṃ pāde, disvāna purisāsabho;
anya-e1101n:1671_0: Namo te purisājañña, namo te purisuttama.
anya-e1101n:1673_0: Khattiyena mahādānaṃ, dinnaṃ sattāhakampi sattāhakaṃpito itipikatthaci no;
anya-e1101n:1676_0: Tato avoca bhagavā, suṇotha mama bhāsitaṃ;
anya-e1101n:1680_0: Api ce sa mahābhogo, ṭhānaṃ pattheti muttamaṃ.
anya-e1101n:1716_0: Navaṃ dadhi madhuñceva, vicinaṃ na ca maddasa.
anya-e1101n:1718_0: Tadāhaṃ taṃ gahetvāna, navaṃ dadhi madhumpica,
anya-e1101n:1719_0: Kammasāmigharaṃ gacchaṃ, tamenaṃ tamesaṃ itisabbattha dāna maddasaṃ.
anya-e1101n:1721_0: Sahassampi ca datvāna, na latiṃsu ca taṃ dvayaṃ;
anya-e1101n:1722_0: Tato evaṃ vicintesiṃ, netaṃ hessati orakaṃ.
anya-e1101n:1724_0: Yathā ime janā sabbe, sakkaronti tathāgataṃ;
anya-e1101n:1736_0: Tato sapattino sampattino; sapattāno iticakatthaci ruddhā, ekāhaṃ rakkhitā ahuṃ;
anya-e1101n:1737_0: Tato tassa vipākena, pāpuṇiṃ nirayaṃ bhusaṃ.
anya-e1101n:1739_0: Pacchime ca bhave dāni, jātohaṃ koliye pure;
anya-e1101n:1740_0: Suppavāsā ca me mātā, mahāli licchavī pitā.
anya-e1101n:1746_0: Mātā me chandadānena, eva māsi sudukkhitā.
anya-e1101n:1755_0: Devo nāgā manussā ca, paccayānu panenti me.
anya-e1101n:1761_0: Lābhaṃ labhāmi sabbattha, vane gāme jale thale.
anya-e1101n:1766_0: Tadā devo panītehi paṇītehi itisabbattha, mamatthāya mahāmati;
anya-e1101n:1772_0: Lābhīnaṃ sīvali aggo, mama sissesu bhikkhavo;
anya-e1101n:1775_0: Kilesā jhāpitā mayhaṃ, bhavā sabbe samūhatā;
anya-e1101n:1778_0: Svāgataṃ vata me āsi, buddhaseṭṭhassa santikaṃ;
anya-e1101n:1779_0: Tisso vijjā anuppatto, kataṃ buddhassa sāsanaṃ.
anya-e1101n:1783_0: Itthaṃ sudaṃ āyasmā sīvalitthero imā gāthāyo abhāsitthāti.

anya-e1101n:1986_1: Tattha dhammāsoko nāma mahiddhiko mahānubhāvo āṇācakkavatti rājā rajjaṃ kāreti.
anya-e1101n:1986_2: Uddhaṃ ākāsato heṭṭhā pathaviyā yojanappamāṇe sakalajambūdīpe tassa āṇā pavattati,
anya-e1101n:1986_3: tadā sakalajambudīpavāsino ca caturāsīti nagarasahasse rājāno ca attano attano balavāhane gahetvā āgamma dhammāsokamahārañño upaṭṭhānaṃ karonti.
anya-e1101n:1986_4: Tasmiṃ samaye devaputtanagare devaputto nāma mahārājā attano balavāhanaṃ gahetvā rañño upaṭṭhānaṃ agamāsi.
anya-e1101n:1986_5: Dhammāsoko devaputtamahārājānaṃ disvā madhurapaṭisanthāraṃ katvā tumhākaṃ raṭṭhe bahussutā āgatāgamā mahāguṇavantā ayyā atthīti pucchi.
anya-e1101n:1986_6: Taṃ sutvā devaputtarājā atthi deva tasmiṃ nagare sīhakumbhakaṃ nāma mahāvihāraṃ.
anya-e1101n:1986_7: Tattha anekasahassabhikkhū viharanti sīlavantā appicchā santuṭṭhā vivekakāmino.
anya-e1101n:1986_8: Tesu sāṭṭhakathātipiṭakadharo indaguttatthero nāma tesaṃ pāmokkho ahosi.
anya-e1101n:1986_10: Guṇavā attano guṇaṃ nissāya loke pākaṭoti.
anya-e1101n:1986_11: Taṃ sutvā rājā tuṭṭhamānaso theraṃ passitukāmo hutvā samma tvameva gantvā theraṃ yācitvā idhā nehīti āha.
anya-e1101n:1986_12: Taṃ sutvā devaputtarājā attano hatthassabalavāhanā dimahā senaṅgaparivuto indaguttattherassa santikaṃ
anya-e1101n:1986_13: gantvā vanditvā ayya ayyaṃ dhammāsokamahārājā daṭṭhukāmoti āha.
anya-e1101n:1986_14: Therena sādhūti sampaṭicchite rājā therena sampaṭicchitabhāvaṃ dhammāsokamahārājino pesesi.
anya-e1101n:1986_15: Tato dhammāsokamahārājā somanassappatto attano āṇāpavattitaṭṭhāne rājūnaṃ sāsanaṃ pesesi.
anya-e1101n:1986_17: Atha te rājāno tuṭṭhapahaṭṭhā attano attano nagare bheriṃ carāpetvā devaputtanagarato yāva pāṭaliputtanagaraṃ
anya-e1101n:1986_18: etthantare pañcapaṇṇāsayojanikaṃ maggaṃ visamaṃ samaṃ karonto devatānaṃ dibbavīthimiva alaṅkaritvā dhammāsokamahānarindassa
anya-e1101n:2047_0: Taṃ sutvā asokamahārājā gaṅgaṃ alaṅkarothāti soḷasayakkhe pesesi,
anya-e1101n:2047_1: te saparivārā tattha gantvā attano ānubhāvena gaṅgāya anto tigāvutaṭṭhāne udukkhalapāsāṇe ṭhapesuṃ.
anya-e1101n:2047_2: Ṭhapetvā thambhe ussāpetvā tulāsaṃghāṭe datvā himavantato rattacandanasāre āharitvā padare santharitvā
anya-e1101n:2047_3: anekehi pūjāvidhānehi alaṅkaritvā rañño evaṃ sāsanaṃ pesesuṃ.
anya-e1101n:2050_0: Amhehi dāni taṃ sabbaṃ, katameva suṇotha taṃ.
anya-e1101n:2056_0: Toraṇā ca ubho passe, ratanehi sunimmitā.
anya-e1101n:2064_0: Tesu tesu ca ṭhānesu, ṭhapitāsuṃ mahāmaṇī;
anya-e1101n:2068_0: Niṭṭhitaṃ idha kātabba, yuttaṃ pūjāvidhiṃtu no;
anya-e1101n:2070_0: Tampi sutvā asoko mahārājā tumheva theraṃ idhānethāti tesaṃyeva sāsanaṃ paṭipesesi,
anya-e1101n:2070_1: te sādhūti indaguttattherassa santikaṃ gantvā vanditvā bhante pāṭaliputtanagarassa gamanāya kāloti āhaṃsu,
anya-e1101n:2070_2: tato thero saṭṭhisahassamattehi bhikkhusaṅghehi parivuto pañcapaṇṇāsayojanamaggaṃ paṭipajji.
anya-e1101n:2070_3: Athāparaṃ devaputtanagaravāsino anekavidhamālāgandhavāsacuṇṇaddhajapatākādīhi anekehi tālāvacarehi naccagītavāditehi pūjetvā agamaṃsu.
anya-e1101n:2070_4: Atha thero mahantena pūjāvidhānena jambudīpavāsīhi pūjiyamāno anukkamena candabhāgāya gaṅgāya setuṃ patvā
anya-e1101n:2070_5: tattha mahantaṃ pūjāvidhānaṃ olokento evaṃ cintesi,
anya-e1101n:2070_6: evaṃ uḷāraṃ pūjāvidhānaṃ idāni jambudīpe nāññassa hoti,
anya-e1101n:2070_8: Ahamevetta uttamo appaṭimoti evaṃ seyyassa seyyohamasmīti mānaṃ uppādetvā aṭṭhāsi.
anya-e1101n:2070_9: Tasmiṃ khaṇe eko khīṇāsavatthero taṃ mānenupatthaddhacetasā ṭhitaṃ dibbacakkhunā disvā upasaṅkamitvā vanditvā therassa ovadanto evamāha. Tasmā.
anya-e1101n:2072_0: Mā mānassa vasī hotha, māno bhante vasaṃgataṃ mānaṃbhantevasīkataṃ itisabbattha;
anya-e1101n:2073_0: Anatthado sadā hoti, pātetvāna bhavā vaṭe.
anya-e1101n:2078_0: Mā mānaṃ sāmi pūrehi, attānaṃ parisodhaya;
anya-e1101n:2079_0: Aparisuddhā sayo bhikkhu, dāyakaṃ na paritosati.
anya-e1101n:2082_0: Mahapphalaṃ mahābhūtiṃ, kāmattha hotha nibbaṇāti nimmanā itikattaci.
anya-e1101n:2083_0: Taṃ sutvā thero saṃsāre nibbindo tattheva ṭhito tilakkhaṇaṃ paṭṭhapetvā karajakāyaṃ sammasanto sahapaṭi sambhidāhi arahattaṃ patvāva nikkhami.
anya-e1101n:2083_1: Tato dhammāsokamahārājā balavāhanaparivuto mahantena pūjāvidhānena paṭimaggaṃ āgamma vanditvā tato diguṇaṃ
anya-e1101n:2083_2: pūjāsakkāraṃ kurumāno mahābhikkhusaṅghena saddhiṃ theraṃ attano nagaraṃ netvā tassa dhammakathaṃ sutvā
anya-e1101n:2083_3: pasannamānaso pañcasīle patiṭṭhāya mahantaṃ vihāraṃ kāretvā therena sahāgatānaṃ saṭṭhisahassānaṃ bhikkhūnaṃ
anya-e1101n:2083_5: atha thero sāṭṭhakathaṃ piṭakattayaṃ pakāsento tasmiṃ ciraṃ vasitvā tattheva parinibbāyi.
anya-e1101n:2083_6: Tato rājā sapariso tassa sarīranikkhepaṃ kāretvā dhātuyo gahetvā mahantaṃ cetiyaṃ kārāpesīti.
anya-e1101n:2091_0: Amhākaṃ bhagavā dasapāramiyo pūretvā anukkamena tusitabhavane nibbatto devehi ārādhito sakkarājakule
anya-e1101n:2091_1: paṭisandhiṃ gahetvā mātukucchito nikkhanto anukkamena paramābhisambodhiṃ patvā tato paṭṭhāya pañcacattālīsasaṃvaccharāni
anya-e1101n:2091_2: ṭhatvā caturāsītidhammakkhandhasahassāni desetvā gaṇanapathamatīte satte bhavakantārato santāretvā sabbabuddhakiccāni
anya-e1101n:2091_3: niṭṭhāpetvā kusinārāyaṃ upavattane mallānaṃ sālavane yamakasālāna mantare uttarasīsakaṃ paññatte mañcake
anya-e1101n:2091_4: vesākhapuṇṇadivase dakkhiṇena passena sato sampajāno anuṭṭhānaseyyāya nipanno pacchimayāme bhikkhū ovaditvā
anya-e1101n:2091_6: sa samaye mahāpathaviṃkampento anupādisesāya nibbāṇadhātuyā parinibbāyi,
anya-e1101n:2091_7: nibbute pana bhagavati lokanāthe ānandatthero mallarājūnaṃ etaṃ pavattiṃ ārocesi.
anya-e1101n:2091_8: Tato kosinārakā ca devabrahmādayo ca sannipatitvā naccagītavāditehi mālāgandhādīhi ca sakkarontā garukarontā
anya-e1101n:2091_9: mānentā pūjentā celavitānādayo karontā bhagavato sarīraṃ nagaramajjhe yattha makuṭabandhanaṃ nāma mallānaṃ cetiyaṃ,
anya-e1101n:2091_10: tattha netvā cakkavattissa sarīraṃ viya ahatena vatthena veṭhetvā tato vihatena kappāsena veṭhetvāti
anya-e1101n:2091_11: evaṃ pañcadussayugasatehi veṭhetvā āyasāya teladoṇiyā pakkhipitvā aññissāya āyasāya doṇiyā paṭikujjitvā
anya-e1101n:2091_12: sabbagandhānaṃ citakaṃ karitvā bhagavato sarīraṃ citakaṃ āropesuṃ.
anya-e1101n:2091_13: Atha mahākassapattherena bhagavato pāde sirasā vandite devatānubhāvena citako samantā ekappahāreneva pajjali.
anya-e1101n:2091_14: Bhagavato pana sarīre daḍḍhe sumanamakuḷasadisā dhātuyo avasissiṃsu.
anya-e1101n:2091_15: Tasmiṃ kira samaye kosalarañño janapade aññatarā gāmavāsikā itthī bhagavati parinibbute sādhukīḷhaṃ āgacchamānā
anya-e1101n:2091_16: antarāmagge attano sarīre uppannavātarogena upaddutā sādhukīḷhaṃ sampāpuṇituṃ asakkontī satthu āḷāhanaṃ
anya-e1101n:2091_17: gantvā bhagavato dhātusarīre tīṇi sākhapupphāni pūjetvā pasannamānasā pañcapatiṭṭhitena vanditvā gatā
anya-e1101n:2091_18: tāya eva rattiyā majjhimayāme kālaṃ katvā tāvatiṃsabhavane tiṃsayojanike kanakavimāne nibbatti.
anya-e1101n:2091_19: Tassā pubbakammapakāsanatthaṃ cakkamattāni sākhapupphāni tatta tattha olambanti.
anya-e1101n:2091_20: Teheva sabbaṃ vimānaṃ ekobhāsī ekobhāsi tato itisabbattha ahosi.
anya-e1101n:2091_22: sā pana attano sobhaggappattaṃ attabhāvañca vimānasampadañca parivārasampattiyo ca disvā vimhitamānasā pubbe katena pubbekissame.
anya-e1101n:2091_23: pubbekatename iticakatthaci kena me puññakammenā yaṃ laddhāti olokantī bhagavato dhātusarīrasmiṃ pūjitāni
anya-e1101n:2091_24: tīṇi sākhapupphāni disvā pasannamānasā mahācakkappamāṇaṃ sākhamālaṃ hatthena dhārentī dhātupūjanatthāya agamāsi.
anya-e1101n:2091_25: Tadā tattha sannipatitā manussā tassā rūpasampadañca hatte mahantaṃ sākhamālañca disvā vimhitamānasā amma tvaṃ kattha vāsikā.
anya-e1101n:2091_27: taṃ sutvā devadhītā attanā bhagavato dhātusarīrassa pūjitasākhamālattayānubhāvena paṭiladdhasampattiyo
anya-e1101n:2091_28: ca dibbavimānañca pubbe matakalevaraṃ cāti sabbaṃ tesaṃ dassetvā dhammadesanāvasāne āha.
anya-e1101n:2093_0: Samāgatā bhavantā bho, passantu mama sampadaṃ;
anya-e1101n:2108_0: Cakkamattā sākhapupphā, tattha tatthūpalambare tatavatthupalabbare itipikatthaci;
anya-e1101n:2112_0: Tehi piñjaritā devā, kīḷanti ca lalantica.
anya-e1101n:2117_0: Passathemaṃ bhujaṅgā bho, sattā mohena pārutā;
anya-e1101n:2118_0: Hīyyo mataṃ paviddhaṃ me, pūtibhūtaṃ kalevaraṃ.
anya-e1101n:2127_0: Dhātuṃ hīyyo mahiṃ sammā, ajja sagge patiṭṭhitā.
anya-e1101n:2135_0: Bindumattampi yo puñña, bījaṃ ropeti sāsane;
anya-e1101n:2136_0: Na hā natthaphalaṃ nahapanantaphalaṃ itipikatthaci hoti, yāva nibbāṇapattiyāti.
anya-e1101n:2137_0: Evaṃ sā devatā attanā paṭiladdhadibbavibhavaṃ dassetvā janakāyaṃ ovaditvā dibbasākhapupphehi jinadhātuṃ
anya-e1101n:2137_1: pūjetvā manussānaṃ passantānaṃyeva saddhiṃ vimānena devalokameva agamāsi.
anya-e1101n:2137_2: Taṃ disvā mahājano dānādīni puññāni katvā devalokaṃ pūresīti.
anya-e1101n:2145_0: Amhākaṃ bhagavati parinibbute magadharaṭṭhe macalaṃ nāma mahāgāmaṃ ahosi.
anya-e1101n:2145_1: Tattha moriyonāma brāhmaṇo paṭivasati saddho pasanno,
anya-e1101n:2145_4: Te ubhopi samaggā sammodamānā bhikkhusaṅghaṃ nimantetvā niccaṃ dānaṃ pavattentā cīvarādicatupaccayehi
anya-e1101n:2145_5: upaṭṭhahantā sīlaṃ rakkhantā uposathakammaṃ karontā divasaṃ vītināmenti.
anya-e1101n:2145_6: Athassa gehe vibhavaṃ yebhuyyena dānādīsu parikkhayamagamāsi.
anya-e1101n:2145_7: Tato brāhmaṇī sāmi no gehe dhanaṃ parikkhīṇaṃ.
anya-e1101n:2145_10: Yenakenaci upāyena dānaṃ patiṭṭhapessāmāti vatvā tasmiṃyeva attano saussāhataṃ pakāsonto āha.
anya-e1101n:2147_0: Jānamāno hi lokasmiṃ, dānassedaṃ phalaṃ iti;
anya-e1101n:2148_0: Na dajjā ko susīlesu, appampi divasampati.
anya-e1101n:2151_0: Kohināma naro loke, na dadeyya hite ratoti.
anya-e1101n:2152_0: Evañca pana vatvā bhadde vanaṃ pavisitvā anekavidhāni paṇṇāni ca phalāni ca pacchipūraṃ āharitvā vikkiṇitvāpi
anya-e1101n:2152_1: dānaṃ na upacchindissāmāti vatvā tato paṭṭhāya vanaṃ gantvā paṇṇāni ca phalāni ca āharitvā vikkiṇitvā
anya-e1101n:2152_3: Athekadivasaṃ brāhmaṇo vanaṃ paviṭṭho paṇṇehi ca phalehi ca pacchiṃ pūretvā sīsenā dāya gehaṃ āgacchanto
anya-e1101n:2152_5: sandamānasītalā malajalappavāhaṃ akaddamāninnasupatittehi sundaraṃ kandaraṃ disvā pacchiṃ tīre ṭhapetvā
anya-e1101n:2152_7: tasmiṃ khaṇe tattha ekasmiṃ rukkhe adhivattho devaputto taṃ tattha nahāyantaṃ disvā kinnu kho esa kalyāṇajjhāsayo
anya-e1101n:2152_8: vā udāhu pāpajjhāsayo sattoti dibbacakkhunā upadhāranto acchariyapuriso eso duggatopi hutvā attano dānappaveṇiyā
anya-e1101n:2152_9: upacchijjanabhayena vanaṃ gantvā paṇṇāni ca phalāni ca āharitvā dukkhena kasirena jīvikaṃ kappento dānadhammaṃ
anya-e1101n:2152_10: na upacchindatīti cintetvā tassa guṇādayo paṭicca pacchiyaṃ ṭhapitapaṇṇāni ca phalāni ca sabbāni suvaṇṇāni
anya-e1101n:2152_13: atha so suvaṇṇapuṇṇapacchiyaṃ upari suvaṇṇarāsimatthake sabbakāmadadaṃ mahantaṃ maṇiratanaṃ ṭhapetvā antarahito paṭikkamma aṭṭhāsi,
anya-e1101n:2152_14: tato brāhmaṇo nahātvā uttiṇṇo pacchiyaṃ sampuṇṇasuvaṇṇavaṇṇaraṃsinā sambhinnavijjotamānamaṇiratanaṃ disvā
anya-e1101n:2152_15: kimetaṃti āsaṅkitaparisaṅkito pacchisamīpaṃ gantvā hatthaṃ pasāretuṃ avisahanto aṭṭhāsi.
anya-e1101n:2152_16: Taṃ disvā devaputto dissamānasarīrena ṭhatvā mā tvaṃ bhāyi brāhmaṇa.
anya-e1101n:2152_19: atha brāhmaṇo devaputtassa kathaṃ sutvā ayaṃ devaputto imaṃ mayā nimmitaṃ,
anya-e1101n:2152_21: Kinnu kho so attano ānubhāvena deti,
anya-e1101n:2152_22: udāhu mayā katapuññenāti pucchissāmi taṃti pañjalikova devaputtaṃ pucchanto āha.
anya-e1101n:2163_0: Yena dajjāsi me deva, kiṃ me sucaritaṃ citaṃ.
anya-e1101n:2165_0: Kinnu purātanaṃ kammaṃ, kena kammena dassasi;
anya-e1101n:2166_0: Athavā taviddhiyā desi, taṃ me akkhāhi pucchitoti.
anya-e1101n:2167_0: Tato devaputto na kho panāhaṃ brāhmaṇa devoti paresaṃ kiñci dātuṃ sakkomi,
anya-e1101n:2167_1: tayā pubbe katasucaritānubhāvena nibbattatīti vatvā dibbacakkhunā tassa pubbakammaṃ disvā tassa pakāsento āha.
anya-e1101n:2170_0: Sabbattha patthaṭaṃ āsi, tassa buddhassa sāsanaṃ.
anya-e1101n:2173_0: Saddho āsi pasanno ca, dāyako kusale rato.
anya-e1101n:2181_0: Tato tvaṃ caramānaṃ taṃ, disvā kampitamānaso;
anya-e1101n:2182_0: Vatthayugaṃ adāsi tvaṃ, saddahaṃ dānato phalaṃ.
anya-e1101n:2187_0: Imaṃ tvaṃ akarī puññaṃ, tuyhetaṃ caritaṃ imaṃ;
anya-e1101n:2189_0: Evañca pana vatvā idaṃ te brāhmaṇa dhanaṃ rājādīhi mayā anāharaṇīyaṃ kataṃ,
anya-e1101n:2189_2: imaṃ kho pana maṇiratanaṃ icchiticchitaṃ pasavati,
anya-e1101n:2189_3: tenāpi ānubhāvena tava dānaṃ anupacchindanto puttadārādayo posehīti anusāsi,
anya-e1101n:2189_4: taṃ sutvā brāhmaṇo tena vuttaniyāmeneva bhikkhusaṅghassa mahādānaṃ dadanto sīlaṃ rakkhanto ciraṃ vasitvā aparabhāge tato cuto devaloke nibbattīti.
anya-e1101n:2197_0: Ekasmiṃ kira samaye laṅkādīpavāsino saṭṭhimattā bhikkhū jayamahābodhiṃ vanditukāmā ekato mantetvā mahātitthena
anya-e1101n:2197_1: nāvaṃ āruyha jambudīpaṃ patvā tāmalittipaṭṭhene tamalittapaṭṭane itikatthaci otaritvā anukkamena pāṭaliputtanagaraṃ
anya-e1101n:2197_3: Atha tasmiṃ nagare piṇḍāya carante te bhikkhū eko duggatamanusso disvā cirena cirenāhaṃdiṭṭhā itisabbattha
anya-e1101n:2197_4: mayā diṭṭhā buddhaputtāti somanasso bhariyaṃ pakkositvā bhadde imesaṃ ayyānaṃ dānaṃ dātukāmomhi,
anya-e1101n:2197_5: pubbe no akatapuññattā idāni duggatā jātā,
anya-e1101n:2197_6: imesu puññakkhettesu bījaṃ no ce ropessāma,
anya-e1101n:2197_7: punapi evameva bhavissāmāti vatvā kiṃ me gehe deyyadhammaṃ atthīti pucchi.
anya-e1101n:2197_8: Sā taṃ sutvā ghare no sāmi ayyānaṃ kiñci dātabbaṃ na passāmi.
anya-e1101n:2197_9: Api ca mama puttaṃ māretvā dānaṃ dātuṃ sakkāti.
anya-e1101n:2197_10: So tassā kathaṃ sutvā bhadde puttaṃ māretvā kiṃ dānaṃ demāti āha.
anya-e1101n:2197_11: Tāya taṃ sutvā sāmi kiṃ na jānāsi,
anya-e1101n:2197_12: putte no mate sandiṭṭhasambhattā ñātimittasuhajjā ca amhākaṃ santikaṃ āgacchāntā kiñci paṇṇākāraṃ gahetvā āgacchanti.
anya-e1101n:2197_13: Mayaṃ tena paṇṇākārena dānaṃ dassāmāti vutte upāsako sādhu tathā karohīti mātuyā eva bhāramakāsi,
anya-e1101n:2197_14: sā puttaṃ māretuṃ avisahantī āha. Tathā hi.
anya-e1101n:2199_0: Kicchā laddhaṃ piyaṃ puttaṃ, ammammāti piyaṃ vadaṃ;
anya-e1101n:2203_0: Māretuṃ taṃ na sakkomi, hadayaṃ me pavedhatīti.
anya-e1101n:2204_0: Evañca pana vatvā ahaṃ sāmi na sakkomi puttaṃ māretuṃ.
anya-e1101n:2204_2: Atha sopi taṃ māretu masakkonto evamāha. Vuttañhi.
anya-e1101n:2206_0: Tāyanti pituno dukkhaṃ, puttā puttāti kittitā;
anya-e1101n:2207_0: Pitu dukkhaṃ sukhaṃ puttā, dāyādā honti sabbadā.
anya-e1101n:2209_0: Tasmā me sadisaṃ puttaṃ, pillakaṃ mañjubhāsanaṃ;
anya-e1101n:2210_0: Na sakkomi ahaṃ bhadde, jīvitā taṃ viyojituṃ.
anya-e1101n:2214_0: Evañca pana vatvā so tvameva tava puttaṃ mārehīti pesesi,
anya-e1101n:2214_1: evaṃ tena vutte putthassa mārapāṇūpāyaṃ pariyesantā evamāhaṃsu,
anya-e1101n:2214_7: Iccete eso kho upāyo evāti cintetvā kumāraṃ pakkositvā añcanā valivalayādīhi maṇḍetvā tassa hatthe geṇḍuṃ
anya-e1101n:2214_8: teṇḍuṃ itisabbattha ṭhapetvā tāta pacchāgehe vammikasamīpaṃ gantvā kīḷāti pesesuṃ.
anya-e1101n:2214_9: Tato dārako gantvā geṇḍukena kīḷanto vammikabile geṇḍukaṃ pātesi.
anya-e1101n:2214_10: Atha so geṇḍukaṃ gaṇhissāmīti vammikasusire hatthaṃ pavesesi.
anya-e1101n:2214_11: Tato sappo kujjhitvā susūtisaddaṃ karonto mahantaṃ phaṇaṃ katvā bilato sīsaṃ ukkhipitvā olokento aṭṭhāsi kumārassa hatthato parigalitapāsaṃviya.
anya-e1101n:2214_12: Athassa kumāro kiñci ajānanto sappassa gīvaṃ daḷhaṃ gaṇhi.
anya-e1101n:2214_13: Athassa mātāpitunnaṃ saddhābalena nāgarājā kumārassa karatale aṭṭhaṃsaṃ icchādāyakaṃ kaṇṭhamaṇiratanaṃ pātesi.
anya-e1101n:2214_14: Kumārassa mātāpitaro dvāraṃ nissāya ṭhitā tassa kiriyaṃ olokento taṃ maṇiratanaṃ disvā sīghaṃ gantvā puttaṃ ukkhipitvā hatthato maṇiratanaṃ gaṇhiṃsu.
anya-e1101n:2214_15: Tato te taṃ maṇiratanaṃ parisuddhāsane ṭhapetvā upacāraṃ katvā amhākaṃ idañcidañca dethāti abbhukkiriṃsu.
anya-e1101n:2214_16: Atha te maṇiratanānubhāvena gehadvāre mahantaṃ maṇḍapaṃ kāretvā vitānādinā maṇḍapaṃ alaṅkaritvā bhikkhūnaṃ
anya-e1101n:2214_17: āsanāni paññāpetvā te saṭṭhimatte bhikkhū nisīdāpetvā mahādānaṃ adaṃsu.
anya-e1101n:2214_19: Atha te tesaṃ majjhe attano saddhābalena maṇiratanassa lābhaṃ pakāsetvā imañhi dānatthāyeva pariccajjāmāti
anya-e1101n:2214_20: ekasmiṃ ṭhāne patiṭṭhāpetvā tenānubhāvena yāvajīvaṃ dānaṃ dadantā sīlaṃ rakkhantā āyupariyosāne devaloke
anya-e1101n:2218_0: Na dadāti ko nāma naro samiddho,
anya-e1101n:2222_0: Atīte kira bārāṇasiyaṃ te bhātikā ekato hutvā madhuṃ vikkiṇantā puttadāre posenti.
anya-e1101n:2222_1: Tato tesu eko paccantaṃ gantvā malayavāsīnaṃ malavāsīnaṃ itipikatthaci hatthato madhuṃ kiṇitvā vakkiṇitvā itisabbattha gaṇhāti,
anya-e1101n:2222_3: Eko tena āhaṭāhaṭamadhūni bārāṇasiyaṃ nisīditvā vikkiṇāti.
anya-e1101n:2222_4: Tasmiṃ samaye gandhamādanapabbate eko paccekabuddho vaṇarogenā turo ahosi.
anya-e1101n:2222_5: Athaññataro paccekabuddho tassa madhunā phāsu bhavissatīti ñatvā gandhamādanapabbateyeva ṭhito cīvaraṃ
anya-e1101n:2222_6: pārupitvā ākāsenā gantvā nagaradvāre otaritvā kattha madhuṃ labhāmīti labbhati itisabbattha olokento aṭṭhāsī,
anya-e1101n:2222_7: tadā tasmiṃparakule bhatiṃ katvā jīvamānā ekā ceṭikā ghaṭamādāya udakatthaṃ titthaṃ gacchantī maggā okkamma
anya-e1101n:2222_9: tadā paccekabuddho bhaginī ettha bhikkhāya carantānaṃ katarasmiṃ ṭhāne madhu labbhatīti pucchi.
anya-e1101n:2222_10: Sā tassa kathaṃ sutvā madhuāpaṇassa paññāyanaṭṭhāne ṭhatvā hatthaṃ pasāretvā esa bhante madhuāpaṇoti
anya-e1101n:2222_11: dassetvā yajjāyaṃ paccekabuddho āpaṇato madhuṃ na labhati.
anya-e1101n:2222_12: Mama nivatthavatthakaṃ datvāpi madhuṃ dassāmīti cintetvā olokentī tattheva aṭṭhāsi,
anya-e1101n:2222_13: atha paccekabuddho anupubbena vicaranto caranto itipikatthaci madhuāpaṇaṃ sampāpuṇi,
anya-e1101n:2222_14: tato kuṭimbiko kuṭimba ko itipikatthaci taṃ disvā hatthato pattaṃ gahetvā ādhārake ṭhapetvā madhughaṭaṃ ādāya pattassa upanāmento sahasā nikkujji.
anya-e1101n:2222_15: Tato madhu pattaṃ pūretvā uttaranto puna bhūmiyaṃ pagghari.
anya-e1101n:2222_16: Taṃ disvā somanasso vāṇijo evaṃ patthanamakāsi.
anya-e1101n:2225_0: Tattha pattassa buddhassa, vāṇijo so pasādavā;
anya-e1101n:2229_0: Disvā madhuṃ pasanno so, evaṃ paṇidahī tadā.
anya-e1101n:2233_0: Evañca pana vatvā pattaṃ adāsi, paccekabuddho pattaṃ paṭiggahetvā tattheva ṭhito.
anya-e1101n:2240_1: Athantarāmagge ṭhitā ghaṭaceṭikā paccekabuddhābhimukhaṃ gantvā madhuṃ labhittha bhanteti pucchi.
anya-e1101n:2240_2: Tena laddhaṃ bhaginīti vutte kiṃ vatvā so adāsīti pucchi.
anya-e1101n:2240_4: Sā taṃ sutvā thokaṃ bhante idheva hotha dāsiyā anuggahatthāyāti sīghaṃ gehaṃ gantvā nivatthapiḷotikā
anya-e1101n:2240_5: attano sāṭakaṃ dhovitvā āharitvā cumbaṭakaṃ katvā paccekabuddhassa adāsi,
anya-e1101n:2240_6: yadā so bhante madhudāyako sakalajambudīpe ekarajjaṃ kāreti.
anya-e1101n:2240_7: Tadāhaṃ tassa aggamahesī bhaveyyaṃti vatvā patthanaṃ karontīevamāha.
anya-e1101n:2242_0: Yadā te madhudo bhante, bhūbhujo hoti bhūtale;
anya-e1101n:2243_0: Tassa hessaṃ tadā bhante, piyā aggamahesikā.
anya-e1101n:2246_0: Assaṃ tassa piyācātha, manāpā icchadā icchidā itipikatthaci sadāti.
anya-e1101n:2247_0: Tassāpi tadā paccekabuddho tatheva hotūti maṅgalaṃ vatvā ākāsena gandhamādanameva agamāsi,
anya-e1101n:2247_1: athāparabhāge te tayopi ekato hutvā madhulokanaṃ karontā taṃ madhughaṭaṃ kuhiṃti pucchiṃsu,
anya-e1101n:2247_2: so tenattanā katakammaṃ vatvā sace tumhe tasmiṃ pattiṃ anumodeyyātha,
anya-e1101n:2247_4: Madhuagghanakaṃ mama hatthato gaṇhathāti vatvā tehi tato na no attho nanohattho itisabbattha madhunā,
anya-e1101n:2247_5: kīdisassetaṃ adāsīti vutte taṃ sutvā itaro paccekabuddhā nāme te gandhamādane vasanti kāsāvaṃ pārupitvā kule kule bhikkhaṃ caranti,
anya-e1101n:2247_7: atha tesu jeṭṭho brāhmaṇacaṇḍālakāpi kāsāvaṃ paridahitvā caranti.
anya-e1101n:2247_9: majjhimo kujjhitvā tava paccekabuddhaṃ parasamudde khipāhīti avoca,
anya-e1101n:2247_10: atha tesaṃ kathaṃ sutvā madhudāyako mā bho tumhe ariyānaṃ mahesakkhānaṃ mahānubhāvānaṃ paccekabuddhānaṃ pharusaṃ kathetha.
anya-e1101n:2247_11: Nirayadukkhā na bhāyathātiādinā anekā kārena nivāretvā tesaṃ guṇaṃ pakāsesi,
anya-e1101n:2247_12: taṃ sutvā te ubhopi sādhūti pasannācittā anumodiṃsu,
anya-e1101n:2247_13: aparabhāge te kālaṃ katvā devamanussesu saṃsarantā tattha tattha mahāsampattiyo anubhavitvā amhākaṃ satthu
anya-e1101n:2247_14: parinibbāṇato dvinnaṃ vassasatānaṃ accayena attano attano sampattaṭṭhāne nibbattiṃsu.
anya-e1101n:2249_0: Asoko madhudo sandhi, mittādevī tu ceṭikā;
anya-e1101n:2251_0: Tesu caṇḍālavādī jeṭṭhavāṇijo bindusārarañño jeṭṭhaputtassa sumanarājakumārassa putto hutvā nibbatti.
anya-e1101n:2251_2: Bindusārarañño kira dubbalakāleyeva asokakumāro attanā laddhaṃ ujjeniyā rajjaṃ pahāya āgantvā sabbanagaraṃ
anya-e1101n:2251_4: Taṃ divasameva sumanassa rājakumārassa sumanā nāma devī paripuṇṇagabbhā ahosi.
anya-e1101n:2251_5: Sā aññātakavesena nikkhamitvā avidūre aññataraṃ caṇḍālagāmaṃ sandhāya gacchantī jeṭṭhakacaṇḍālassa gehato avidūre nigrodho atthi,
anya-e1101n:2251_6: tasmiṃ rukkhe adhivatthāya devatāya ito ehi sumaneti vadantiyā saddaṃ sutvā tassā samīpaṃ gatā,
anya-e1101n:2251_7: devatā attano ānubhāvena ekaṃ sālaṃ nimmiṇitvā ettha vasāhīti pādāsi.
anya-e1101n:2251_10: Sā tassa nigrodhadevatāya pariggahitattā nigrodhotveva nāmaṃ akāsi.
anya-e1101n:2251_11: Jeṭṭhakacaṇḍālo diṭṭhadivasatoppabhuti taṃ attano sāmidhītaraṃ viya maññamāno nibaddhavattaṃ paṭṭhapesi.
anya-e1101n:2251_14: tadā mahāvaruṇatthero nāma eko arahā dārakassa hetusampadaṃ disvā viharamāno sattavassiko dāni dārako.
anya-e1101n:2251_15: Kālo naṃ pabbājetuṃti cintetvā rājadhītāya ārocāpetvā nigrodhakumāraṃ pabbājesi,
anya-e1101n:2253_0: Taṃ mahāvaruṇo thero, tadā disvā kumārakaṃ;
anya-e1101n:2256_0: So kira ekadivasaṃ pātova sarīraṃ paṭijaggitvā ācariyupajjhāyavattaṃ katvā pattacīvara mādāya mātuupāsikāya gehadvāraṃ gacchāmīti nikkhami.
anya-e1101n:2256_1: Mātunivāsaṭṭhānañcassa dakkhiṇadvārena nagaraṃ pavisitvā nagaramajjhena gantvā pācīnadvārena nikkhamitvā gantabbaṃ hoti.
anya-e1101n:2256_2: Tena ca samayena asoko dhammarājā pācīnadisābhimukho sīhapañjare caṅkamati.
anya-e1101n:2256_3: Taṃ khaṇaṃyeva nigrodho rājaṅgaṇaṃ sampāpuṇi santindriyo santamānaso yugamattaṃ pekkhamāno,
anya-e1101n:2256_4: tena vuttaṃ ekadivasaṃ sīhapañjare ṭhito addasa nigrodhaṃ sāmaṇeraṃ rājaṅgaṇena gacchantaṃ dantaṃ guttaṃ santindriyaṃ iriyāpathasampannanti.
anya-e1101n:2256_7: Ayaṃ pana daharako avikkhitto ativiyassa ālokitavilokitaṃ sammiñjanapasāraṇañca sobhati.
anya-e1101n:2256_8: Addhā etassabbhantare lokuttaradhammo bhavissatīti rañño saha dassaneneva sāmaṇere cittaṃ pasīdi,
anya-e1101n:2256_10: Pubbe kira puññakaraṇakāle rañño jeṭṭhakabhātā vāṇijakoyaṃ.
anya-e1101n:2258_0: Pubbeva pubbena itikatthaci sannivāsena, paccuppannahitena vā;
anya-e1101n:2259_0: Evaṃ taṃ jāyate pemaṃ, uppalaṃva yathodaketi.
anya-e1101n:2260_0: Atha rājā sañjātapemo sabahumāno sāmaṇeraṃ pakkosathāti amacce pesesi,
anya-e1101n:2260_1: te aticirāyantīti puna dve tayo pesesi turitaṃ āgacchatūti.
anya-e1101n:2260_4: So itocito ca viloketvā natthi dāni añño bhikkhūti samussitasetacchattaṃ rājapallaṅkaṃ upasaṅkamitvā pattaṃ gaṇhanatthāya rañño ākāraṃ dassesi.
anya-e1101n:2260_5: Rājā taṃ pallaṅkasamīpaṃ gacchantaṃ eva disvā cintesi ajjeva dāni ayaṃ sāmaṇero imassa gehassa sāmiko bhavissatīti,
anya-e1101n:2260_6: sāmaṇero rañño hatthe pattaṃ datvā pallaṅkaṃ abhiruhitvā nisīdi.
anya-e1101n:2260_7: Rājā attano atthāya sampāditaṃ sabbaṃ yāgukhajjakabhattavikatiṃ upanāmesi.
anya-e1101n:2260_9: Bhattakiccāvasāne rājā āha satthārā tumhākaṃ dinnaovādaṃ jānāthāti.
anya-e1101n:2260_12: Sādhu mahārājāti rañño anurūpaṃ dhammapaeda appamādavaggaṃ anumodanatthāya abhāsi.
anya-e1101n:2260_14: pamādo maccuno padaṃti sutvāva aññātaṃ tāta,
anya-e1101n:2260_16: Sāmaṇero anumodanā vasāne dvattiṃsadhuvabhattāni dvittiṃsadhurabhattāni itisabbattha labhitvā puna divase
anya-e1101n:2260_17: dvattiṃsabhikkhū gahetvā rājantopuraṃ pavisitvā bhattakicca makāsi.
anya-e1101n:2260_18: Rājā aññepi dvattiṃsabhikkhū tumhehi saddhiṃsve bhikkhaṃ gaṇhantūti eteneva upāyena divase divase vaḍḍhāpento
anya-e1101n:2260_19: saṭṭhisahassānaṃ brāhmaṇaparibbājakānaṃ bhattaṃ upacchinditvā antonivesane saṭṭhisahassānaṃ bhikkhūnaṃ
anya-e1101n:2260_21: Nigrodhattheropi rājānaṃ saparisaṃ tīsu saraṇesu pañcasu sīlesu patiṭṭhāpetvā buddhasāsane pothujjanikena pasādena acalappasādaṃ katvā patiṭṭhāpesi.
anya-e1101n:2260_22: Rājāpi asokārāmaṃ nāma mahāvihāraṃ kārāpetvā saṭṭhisahassānaṃ bhikkhūnaṃ niccabhattaṃ paṭṭhapesi.
anya-e1101n:2265_0: Āse so aseso itipikatthaci hi anāsavoti.
anya-e1101n:2267_0: Madhudāyako pana vāṇijo devalokato cavitvā pupphapure rājakule uppajjitvā piyadāso nāma kumāro hutvā
anya-e1101n:2267_1: chattaṃ ussāpetvā sakalajambudīpe ekarajjaṃ akāsi. Kathaṃ.
anya-e1101n:2268_1: Te sabbe asoko attanā saddhiṃ ekamātikaṃ tissakumāraṃ ṭhapetvā ghātesi.
anya-e1101n:2268_2: Ghātento cattāri vassāni anabhisittova rajjaṃ kāretvā catunnaṃ vassānaṃ accayena tathāgatassa parinibbāṇato
anya-e1101n:2268_3: dvinnaṃ vassasatanaṃ upari aṭṭhārasame vasse sakalajambudīpe ekarajjābhisekaṃ pāpuṇi.
anya-e1101n:2268_4: Atha taṃ sakalajambudīpe caturāsītinagarasahasse rājāno āgantvā upaṭṭhahissanti.
anya-e1101n:2268_5: Tiṇṇaṃ utūnaṃ anucchavikā tayo pāsādā ahesuṃ.
anya-e1101n:2268_11: sā asandhimittā nāma devaccharaparibhāgā rājadhītā hutvā saṭṭhisahassānaṃ itthīnaṃ jeṭṭhikā dhammāsokarañño aggamahesī ahosi.
anya-e1101n:2268_13: pathaviyā ca heṭṭhā yojanappamāṇe āṇā pavattati.
anya-e1101n:2268_15: Anotattadahato aṭṭhahi kājehi soḷasapānīyaghaṭe divase divase devatā āharanti.
anya-e1101n:2268_16: Yato sāsane uppannasaddho hutvā aṭṭhaghaṭe bhikkhusaṅghassa adāsi.
anya-e1101n:2268_17: Dve ghaṭe saṭṭhimattānaṃ tepiṭakabhikkhūnaṃ dve ghaṭe aggamahesiyā asandhimittāya.
anya-e1101n:2268_18: Cattāro ghaṭe attanā paribhuñci devatā devatāevaṃ itisabbattha,
anya-e1101n:2268_19: eva himavantato nāgalatādantakaṭṭhaṃ siniddhaṃ mudukaṃ rasavantaṃ divase divase āharanti,
anya-e1101n:2268_20: tena rañño ca mahesiyā ca soḷasannaṃ nāṭakasahassānañca saṭṭhimattānañca bhikkhusahassānaṃ devasikaṃ dantapoṇakiccaṃ nipphajjati.
anya-e1101n:2268_21: Devasikamevassa devatā agadāmalakaṃ agadaharīṭakaṃ suvaṇṇavaṇṇañca gandharasasampannaṃ ambapakkaṃ āharanti.
anya-e1101n:2268_22: Chaddantadahato pañcavaṇṇaṃ nivāsanapārupanaṃ pītakavaṇṇaṃ hatthapuñchanakapaṭaṃ hatthapucchanakapaṭṭaṃ itisabbattha dibbañca pānaṃ āharanti.
anya-e1101n:2268_23: Devasikamevassa anulepanagandhaṃ pārupanatthāya asuttamayikaṃ sumanapupphapaṭaṃ mahārahañja añjanaṃ nāgabhavanato nāgarājāno āharanti.
anya-e1101n:2268_24: Chaddantadahatoyeva uṭṭhitassa sālino navavāhasahassani divase divase suvā āharanti.
anya-e1101n:2268_27: Rañño sabbaṭṭhānesu ayameva taṇḍulo paribhogaṃ gacchati.
anya-e1101n:2268_30: Karavīkasakuṇā āgantvā madhurassaraṃ vikūjentā rañño balikammaṃ karonti.
anya-e1101n:2268_31: Imāhi iddhīhi samannāgato rājā ekadivasaṃ suvaṇṇasaṅkhalikabandhanaṃ pesetvā catunnaṃ buddhānaṃ adhigatarūpadassanaṃ
anya-e1101n:2268_32: kappā yukaṃ mahākālanāgarājānaṃ ānayitvā setacchattassa heṭṭhā mahārahe pallaṅke nisīdāpetvā anekasata
anya-e1101n:2268_33: vaṇṇehi jalajathalajapupphehi suvaṇṇapupphehi ca pūjaṃ katvā sabbā laṅkārapatimaṇḍitehi soḷasahi nāṭakasahassehi
anya-e1101n:2268_34: samantato parikkhipitvā anantañāṇassa tāva me saddhammavaracakkavattino sammāsambuddhassa sammāsambuddharūpaṃ
anya-e1101n:2268_35: itisabbattha rūpaṃ imesaṃ akkhīnaṃ āpāthaṃ karohīti vatvā tena nimmitaṃ sakalasarīre vippakiṇṇapuññappabhāvanibbattāsīti
anya-e1101n:2268_39: nayanarasāyanamiva ca brahmadevamanujanāgayakkhagaṇānaṃ buddharūpaṃ passanto sattadivasāni akkhipūjaṃ
anya-e1101n:2268_41: Rājā kira abhisekaṃ pāpuṇitvā tīṇiyeva saṃvaccharāni bāhirakapāsaṇḍaṃ parigaṇhi,
anya-e1101n:2268_43: tassa pana pitā bindusāro brāhmaṇabhatto ahosi.
anya-e1101n:2268_44: So brāhmaṇānañca brāhmaṇajātipāsaṇḍānaṃ paṇḍaraṅgaparibbājakānañca saṭṭhisahassamattānaṃ niccabhattaṃ paṭṭhapesi.
anya-e1101n:2268_45: Asokopi pitarā pavattitaṃ dānaṃ attano antopure antepure itisabbattha tatheva dadamāno ekadivasaṃ sīhapañjare
anya-e1101n:2268_46: ṭhito te upasamaparibāhirena ācārena bhuñjamāne asaṃyatindriye avinītairiyāpathe disvā cintesi,
anya-e1101n:2268_47: īdisaṃ dānaṃ upaparikkhitvā yuttaṭṭhāne dātuṃ vaṭṭatīti.
anya-e1101n:2268_49: gacchatha bhaṇe attano attano sādhusammate samaṇabrāhmaṇe antopuraṃ abhiharatha dānaṃ dassāmīti,
anya-e1101n:2268_50: amaccā sādhu devāti rañño paṭissutvā te te paṇḍaraṅgaparibbājakā jīvaka nigaṇṭhādayo ānetvā ime mahārāja amhākaṃ arahantoti āhaṃsu,
anya-e1101n:2268_51: atha rājā antopure uccāvacāni āsanāni paññāpetvā āgacchantūti vatvā āgatāgate āha attano anurūpe āsane nisīdathāti,
anya-e1101n:2268_53: taṃ disvā rājā natthi etesaṃ anto sāroti ñatvā tesaṃ anurūpaṃ khādanīyabhojanīyaṃ datvā uyyojesi.
anya-e1101n:2268_54: Evaṃ gacchante kāle ekadivasaṃ sīhapañjare ṭhito nigrodhasāmaṇeraṃ disvā tasmiṃ gatena pasādena buddhasāsane
anya-e1101n:2268_55: pasanno saṭṭhisahassamatte pāsaṇḍiye apanetvā saṭṭhisahassamatte bhikkhū bhojento buddhasāsane pasīditvā
anya-e1101n:2268_56: asokārāmaṃ kāretvā tattha te vasāpento ekadivasaṃ asokārāme saṭṭhisahassabhikkhūnaṃ dānaṃ datvā tesaṃ
anya-e1101n:2268_57: majjhe nisajja saṅghaṃ catūhi paccayehi pavāretvā imaṃ pañhaṃ pucchi,
anya-e1101n:2268_58: bhante bhagavatā desitadhammo nāma kittako hotīti,
anya-e1101n:2268_61: Rājā dhamme pasīditvā ekekaṃ dhammakkhandhaṃ ekekavihārena pūjessāmīti ekadivasameva channavutikoṭikhanaṃ vissajjetvā amacce āṇāpesi,
anya-e1101n:2268_62: ekamekasmiṃ nagare ekamekaṃ vihāraṃ kārentā caturāsītiyā nagarasahassesu caturāsītivihārasahassāni kārāpethāti,
anya-e1101n:2268_63: sayañca asokārāme asokamahāvihāratthāya sayaṃcaasokahovihāratthāya itipikatthaci kammaṃ paṭṭhapesi,
anya-e1101n:2268_64: saṅgho indaguttattheraṃ nāma mahiddhikaṃ mahānubhāvaṃ khīṇāsavaṃ navakammādhiṭṭhāyakaṃ adāsi,
anya-e1101n:2268_69: amaccā rañño ārocesuṃ niṭṭhitāni deva caturāsītimahāvihārasahassānīti.
anya-e1101n:2268_70: Atha rājā bhikkhusaṅghaṃ upasaṅkamitvā bhante mayā caturāsītivihārasahassāni kāritāni,
anya-e1101n:2268_74: Rājā rājagahe cetiyaṃ bhindāpetvā dhātuṃ apassanto paṭipākatikaṃ kārāpetvā bhikkhubhikkhuṇiyo upāsakaupāsikāyoti
anya-e1101n:2268_80: evaṃ tatrāpi alabhitvā allakappaṃ pāvaṃ kusināraṃti sabbacetiyāni bhinditvā dhātuṃ alabhitvā paṭipākatikāni
anya-e1101n:2268_81: katvā rājagahaṃ gantvā catasso parisā sannipātāpetvā atthi kenaci sutapubbaṃ asukaṭṭhāne dhātunidhānaṃti pucchi.
anya-e1101n:2268_82: Tattheko vīsaṃvassa satiko thero asukaṭṭhāne dhātunidhānaṃti na jānāmi,
anya-e1101n:2268_83: mayhaṃ pana pitāmahatthero mayi sattavassikāle mālācaṅgoṭakaṃ gāhāpetvā ehi sāmaṇera asukagacchantare pāsāṇathūpo atthi.
anya-e1101n:2268_84: Tattha gacchāmāti gantvā pūjetvā imaṃ ṭhānaṃ upadhāretuṃ vaṭṭati sāmaṇerāti āha.
anya-e1101n:2268_86: Rājā etadeva ṭhānaṃti vatvā gacche harāpetvā pāsāṇathūpaṃ paṃsuṃca apanetvā heṭṭhā sudhābhūmiṃ addasa,
anya-e1101n:2268_87: tato sudhā ca iṭṭhakāyo ca harāpetvā anupubbena pariveṇaṃ oruyha sattaratanavālikaṃ asihatthāni ca kaṭṭharūpakāni samparivattantāni addasa,
anya-e1101n:2268_88: so yakkhadāsake pakkosāpetvā balikammaṃ kārāpetvāpi neva antaṃ passanto devatā namassamāno ahaṃ imā dhātuyo
anya-e1101n:2268_90: Mā me devatā antarāyaṃ karontūti āha,
anya-e1101n:2268_91: sakko devarājā cārikaṃ caranto taṃ disvā vissakammaṃ āmantetvā tāta asokadhammarājā dhātuyo nīharissāmīti pariveṇaṃ otiṇṇo.
anya-e1101n:2268_93: So pañcacūlakagāmadārakavesena gantvā rañño purato dhanukahattho ṭhatvā hāremi mahārājāti āha,
anya-e1101n:2268_94: hara tātāti saraṃ gahetvā sandhimhiyeva vijjhi,
anya-e1101n:2268_96: atha rājā āviñjane aviñcine itipikatthaci bandhakuñcikamuddikaṃ gaṇhi,
anya-e1101n:2268_97: maṇikkhandhaṃ passitvā anāgate daḷiddarājāno imaṃ maṇiṃ gahetvā dhātūnaṃ sakkāraṃ karontūti paṇṇe akkharāni
anya-e1101n:2268_98: disvā kujjhitvā mādisānaṃ pana rājūnaṃ rājānaṃ itisabbattha daḷiddarājāti vattuṃ ayuttaṃti punappunaṃ
anya-e1101n:2268_99: ghaṭetvā dvāraṃ vivaritvā antogehaṃ paviṭṭho aṭṭhārasavassādhikānaṃ dvinnaṃ vassasatānaṃ upari āropitadīpā
anya-e1101n:2268_101: nīluppalapupphāni taṃkhaṇaṃyeva āharitvā āropitāni viya pupphasanthāro taṃ khaṇaṃ santhato viya gandhā taṃ muhuttaṃ piṃsitvā ṭhapitā viya ahesuṃ.
anya-e1101n:2268_102: Rājā suvaṇṇapaṭṭaṃ gahetvā anāgate piyadāso nāma kumāro chattaṃ ussāpetvā asoko nāma dhammarājā bhavissati,
anya-e1101n:2268_103: so imā dhātuyo vitthāritā karissatīti vācetvā diṭṭhohaṃ ayyena mahākassapattherenāti vatvā vāmahatthaṃ ābhujitvā dakkhiṇahatthena apphoṭesi.
anya-e1101n:2268_104: So tasmiṃ ṭhāne paricaraṇakadhātumattameva ṭhapetvā sesadhātuyo sabbā gahetvā dhātugharaṃ pubbe pihitanayeneva
anya-e1101n:2268_105: pidahitvā sabbā yathā pakatiyāyeva kāretvā uparipāsāṇacetiyaṃ patiṭṭhāpetvā caturāsītiyā vihārasahassesu
anya-e1101n:2268_107: Athekadivasaṃ rājā vihāraṃ gantvā bhikkhusaṃghaṃ vanditvā ekamante nisinno yadi bhante channavutikoṭidhanaṃ
anya-e1101n:2268_108: vissajjetvā caturāsītivihārasahassānisacetiyāni kārāpetvāpi ahaṃ na dāyādo.
anya-e1101n:2268_111: yo pana attano puttañca dhītarañca pabbājeti,
anya-e1101n:2268_112: ayaṃ sāsane dāyādo nāmāti evaṃ vutte asoko rājā sāsane dāyādabhāvaṃ patthayamāno avidūre ṭhitaṃ mahindakumāraṃ
anya-e1101n:2268_113: disvā sakkhissasi tāta tvaṃ pabbajituṃti āha.
anya-e1101n:2268_114: Kumāro pakatiyā pabbajitukāmo rañño vacanaṃ sutvā ativiya pāmojjajāto pubbajāmi pabbajjāmi itisabbattha deva.
anya-e1101n:2268_115: Maṃ pabbājetvā sāsane dāyādo hothāti āha.
anya-e1101n:2268_116: Tena ca samayena rājadhītā saṃghamittāpi tasmiṃ ṭhāne ṭhitā hoti.
anya-e1101n:2268_117: Taṃ disvā āha tvampi amma pabbajituṃ sakkhissasīti,
anya-e1101n:2268_119: Rājā puttānaṃ manaṃ labhitvā pahaṭṭhacitto bhikkhusaṃghaṃ upasaṅkamitvā bhante ime dārake pabbājetvā maṃ sāsane dāyādaṃ karothāti.
anya-e1101n:2268_120: Saṅgho rañño vacanaṃ sampaṭicchitvā kumāraṃ moggaliputtatissattherena upajjhāyena mahādevattherena ācariyena pabbajāpesi pabbajjāpesi itisabbattha.
anya-e1101n:2268_122: so upasampadāmālakeyeva saha paṭisambhidāhi arahattaṃ pāpuṇi.
anya-e1101n:2268_123: Saṅghamittāyapi rājadhītāya ācariyāṇī āyupālattherī nāma acāriyā āyupālattherīnāma itisabbattha.
anya-e1101n:2268_125: Rājā pana anekākārena buddhasāsanaṃ sobhetvā moggaliputtatissattherassa sahāyena sahayyena.
anya-e1101n:2268_127: sāhayyena itipikatthaci saṭṭhisahassamatte dussīle titthiye buddhasāsanā uppabbājetvā tatiyadhammasaṃgītiṃ niṭṭhāpesi.
anya-e1101n:2268_128: Tasmiṃ kira samāgame bhikkhubhikkhuṇiyo kittakāti kittakānīti itisabbattha, vuttañhi.
anya-e1101n:2274_0: Khīṇāsavā sikkhuṇiyo, sahassaṃ āsu tāsu cāti.
anya-e1101n:2275_0: Evaṃ so asoko dhammarājā sakalajambudīpe aggarājā hutvā buddhasāsanaṃ sobhento vihāsi.
anya-e1101n:2279_0: Majjhimo pana vāṇijo attano pāravādidosena parasamudde laṅkāyaṃ nibbatti.
anya-e1101n:2279_2: Tambapaṇṇidīpe kira muṭasīvo nāma rājā saṭṭhivassāni rajjaṃ kāresi,
anya-e1101n:2279_3: tassa puññapaññāguṇopetā aññamaññaṃ hitesino dasa puttā ahesuṃ.
anya-e1101n:2279_6: Athāparasmiṃ samaye amaccā muṭasīvaraññe kālakate devānaṃpiyatissakumāraṃ abhisiñciṃsu,
anya-e1101n:2282_0: Tesu ahosimuṭasīvassa, dasaputtesupuññavā itikatthaci bhātusu sabbesu, puññapaññādhiko ahu.
anya-e1101n:2291_0: Tatra jātāni ca thalaṃ, ratanāni samāruhuṃ.
anya-e1101n:2296_0: Tāsu ekā latāyaṭṭhi, rajatābhā tahiṃ latā;
anya-e1101n:2303_0: Nānā ca nānāvaṇṇā ca, sajīvāviya dissare.
anya-e1101n:2306_0: Kakudhaphalā pākatikā, icce tā aṭṭha jātiyā.
anya-e1101n:2312_0: Ratanāni pane tāni, muttā tā tāca yaṭṭhiyo;
anya-e1101n:2314_0: Tena ca samayena devānaṃpiyatissamahārājā ca asoko dhammarājā ca addiṭṭhasahāyā honti.
anya-e1101n:2314_1: Tasmā so etāni ratanāni ca aññāni bahūni upāyanāni mama sahāyassa dethāti dhammāsokamahānarindassa paṇṇākāratthāya pesesi.
anya-e1101n:2314_2: Sopi taṃ disvā pasīditvā pañcarājakakudhabhaṇḍāni ca aññañca bahupaṇṇākārañca abhisekatthāya pesesi.
anya-e1101n:2316_0: Ahaṃ buddhaṃca dhammaṃca; Saṃghaṃca saraṇaṃ gato;
anya-e1101n:2321_1: tena kho pana samayena moggaliputtatissatthero kattha nukho anāgate sāsanaṃ suppatiṭṭhitaṃ bhaveyyāti
anya-e1101n:2321_2: upaparikkhanto paccantime suppatiṭṭhitaṃ bhavissatīti ñatvā te te there tattha tattha pesetvā mahāmahindattheraṃ
anya-e1101n:2321_4: sakko ca devānamindo mahāmahindattheraṃ upasaṃkamitvā kālakato bhante muṭasīvo rājā.
anya-e1101n:2321_6: Sammāsambuddhena ca tumhe byākatā anāgate mahindo nāma bhikkhu tambapaṇṇidīpaṃ pasādessatīti.
anya-e1101n:2321_7: Tasmā tiha kho bhante kālo dīpavaraṃ gamanāya,
anya-e1101n:2321_9: thero tassa vacanaṃ sampaṭicchitvā attasattamo cetiyapabbatavihārato vehāsaṃ uppatitvā anurādhapurassa puratthimadisāya missakapabbate patiṭṭhahi,
anya-e1101n:2321_12: rājā chaṇaṃ karothāti amacce āṇāpetvā cattāḷīsasahassapurisehi parivārito nagaramhā nikkhamitvā missakapabbataṃ pāyāsi migavaṃ kīḷitukāmo.
anya-e1101n:2321_13: Atha tasmiṃ pabbate adhivatthā ekā devatā rañño there dassessāmīti rohitamīgavaṇṇena avidūre tiṇapaṇṇāni khādamānā viya carati,
anya-e1101n:2321_14: rājā ayuttaṃ dāni pamattaṃ vijjhituṃti jiyaṃ poṭhesi,
anya-e1101n:2321_18: mahindatthero rājānaṃ avidūre āgacchanta maṃyeva rājā passatu,
anya-e1101n:2321_19: mā itareti adhiṭṭhahitvā tissa tissa ito ehīti āha,
anya-e1101n:2321_21: Imasmiṃ tambapaṇṇidīpe jāto maṃ tissoti nāmaṃ gahetvā ālapituṃ samattho nāma natthi.
anya-e1101n:2321_22: Ayaṃ pana chinnabhinnapaṭadharo bhaṇḍukāsāva vasano maṃ nāmenā lapati,
anya-e1101n:2321_23: ko nukho yaṃ bhavissati manusso amanusso vāti.
anya-e1101n:2325_0: Rājā dhammāsokanarindena pesitasāsanānusārena anussaramāno ayyā nukho āgatāti tāvadeva āyudhaṃ nikkhipitvā
anya-e1101n:2325_1: ekamantaṃ nisīdi sammodanīyaṃ kathaṃ kathayamāno sāraṇīyaṃ sammodanīyaṃ-
anya-e1101n:2325_3: Tasmiṃ tānipi cattāḷīsapurisasahassāni āgantvā taṃ parivāresuṃ,
anya-e1101n:2325_5: rājā disvā ime kadā āgatāti pucchi,
anya-e1101n:2325_7: Idāni pana jambudīpe aññepi evarūpā samaṇā santīti.
anya-e1101n:2325_8: Mahārāja etarahi jambudīpo kāsāvapajjoto isivātapaṭivāto, tasmiṃ.
anya-e1101n:2329_1: atha thero rukkhopamādinā tassa paññāveyyattiyaṃ ñatvā dhammaṃ desesi sanarāmarehi sādhukāraṃ kārayamāno.
anya-e1101n:2332_0: Suttantaṃ desayī thero, mahīpassa mahāmati mahīmatī itipikatthaci.
anya-e1101n:2333_0: Desanāpariyosāne so saddhiṃ tehi narehi cattāḷīsasahassehi saraṇesu patiṭṭhahīti.
anya-e1101n:2333_1: Athassa rājā sve bhante mama gehe bhikkhaṃ gaṇhāthāti yācitvā gantvā nagarañca rājagehañca alaṅkaritvā
anya-e1101n:2333_2: there nisīdāpetvā paṇītenāhārena parivisitvā anuḷādevippamukhāhi pañcasataitthīhi saddhiṃ ekamantaṃ nisīdi.
anya-e1101n:2333_6: nandanavane sahassaṃti evaṃ dutiyadivase aḍḍhateyyāni pāṇasahassāni sotāpattiphale patiṭṭhāpesi.
anya-e1101n:2333_7: Tatiyadivase aḍḍhanavappamāṇaṃ pāṇasahassaṃti evaṃ anekasatānaṃ anekasahassānaṃ anekasata sahassānaṃ dhammā mataṃ pāyesi. Vuttañhi.
anya-e1101n:2343_0: Atha rājā sumanasāmaṇerena dhammāsokassa hatthato sammāsambuddhaparibhuttapattapūradhātuyo ca sakkassa
anya-e1101n:2343_2: itisabbattha cetiyapabbate thūpaṃ ādiṃkatvā sakalalaṅkādīpe yojane yojane thūpāni kāretvā dakkhiṇakadhātuṃ nidahitvā thūpārāmathūpañca patiṭṭhāpesi.
anya-e1101n:2343_3: Atha saṅghamittāya theriyā ānītaṃ jayamahābodhino dakkhiṇamahāsākhaṃ patiṭṭhāpetvā pūjaṃ kāresi.
anya-e1101n:2354_0: Bhagavati parinibbute laṅkāyaṃ sāsane suppatiṭṭhite tattha hakureḷīti eko gāmo ahosi,
anya-e1101n:2354_1: tatthekā dārikā gāmādārikāhi saddhiṃ tattha tattha kīḷantī viharati,
anya-e1101n:2354_4: Manussā buddhapūjanatthaṃ pupphāni viciṇantā udakaṃ ogahetvā rukkhamabhiruyha pupphāni ociṇanti,
anya-e1101n:2354_5: kumārikā te disvā manussā sukhena gantvā pupphāni ociṇantūti ekaṃ sukkhapālibhaddadaṇḍakaṃ āharitvā setuṃ katvā ṭhapesi,
anya-e1101n:2354_6: tato paṭṭhāya manussā tenagantvā pupphāni ociṇanti.
anya-e1101n:2354_7: Atha sā tato cutā teneva kusalakammena jambudīpe pāṭaliputtanagare somadattarañño dhītā hutvā nibbatti,
anya-e1101n:2354_10: Pubbe katasetuānubhāvena tassā suvīrako nāmeko ākāsagāmī sindhavapotako nibbatti.
anya-e1101n:2354_11: Rājadhītuyā pana pitā buddhamāmako dhammamāmako saṅghamāmako hutvā mahantaṃ puññaṃ pasavanto sindhavapotakaṃ
anya-e1101n:2354_12: disvā puññakaraṇassa me sahāyo laddhoti tuṭṭhamānaso assaṃ abhiruhitvā divasassa tikkhattuṃ gantvā mahābodhiṃ vandati.
anya-e1101n:2354_13: Rājadhītā naṃ disvā pitusantikaṃ gantvā abhiṇhaṃ tāta kuhiṃ gacchasīti pucchi.
anya-e1101n:2354_15: atha sā punappunaṃ pitaraṃ nibandhantī pucchi.
anya-e1101n:2359_0: Puttadāre ca rajje ca, patvā datvā itipikatthaci pāramimatthakaṃ;
anya-e1101n:2381_0: Upāsati sadā gantvā, yo naro bodhipādapaṃ;
anya-e1101n:2384_0: Sa naro nirāmayo hoti, paccatte ca parattha ca;
anya-e1101n:2385_0: Pūjito mānito hoti, dīghāyu balavā sukhī.
anya-e1101n:2389_0: Taṃ sutvā kumārikā pītiyā phuṭasarīrā pitaraṃ vanditvā ahampi tāta gacchāmīti āha.
anya-e1101n:2389_1: Rājā panassā upaddavabhayena gamanaṃ na icchi.
anya-e1101n:2389_2: Tato sā yāvatatiyaṃ pitaraṃ yācitvā raññā anuññātā.
anya-e1101n:2389_3: Tato paṭṭhāya pitarā saddhiṃ sindhavamāruyha bodhiṃ vandituṃ satataṃ gacchati.
anya-e1101n:2389_6: etissā anāgate yaṃkiñci bhayaṃ uppajjamānaṃ tato uppajjati.
anya-e1101n:2389_8: Tato sindhavaṃ pakkosāpetvā tassa kaṇṇamūle mantento evamāha,
anya-e1101n:2389_9: tāta mama dhītā abhiṇhaṃ tava sahāyaṃ katvā bodhiṃ vandituṃ gacchati.
anya-e1101n:2389_12: Tattha gamanāgamane mama dhītaraṃ rakkheyyāsīti tassa dhītaraṃ paṭipādetvā kālamakāsi.
anya-e1101n:2389_13: Tato rājadhītā pitusarīrakiccaṃ kāretvā divasassa tikkhattuṃ assamabhiruyha bodhiupaṭṭhānaṃ gacchati.
anya-e1101n:2389_14: Manussā panassā rūpasampattiṃ disvā vimhitamānasā rājārahaṃ vata no idaṃ paṇṇākāraṃ diṭṭhaṃ.
anya-e1101n:2389_16: Appeva nāma rājā so kiñci no dadeyyāti cintetvā rañño santikaṃ gantvā vanditvā ṭhitā evamāhaṃsu.
anya-e1101n:2392_0: Vandantī yāti kaññekā, vijjūva siriyā jalaṃ.
anya-e1101n:2400_0: Īdisaṃ no mahārājā mahārājadiṭṭhapubba itipikatthaci, diṭṭhapubbaṃ kudācanaṃ;
anya-e1101n:2402_0: Taṃ sutvā rājā savaṇasaṃsaggeneva tāya paṭibaddhacitto caturaṅginiṃsenaṃ gahetvā rājadhītaraṃ bodhivandanatthāya
anya-e1101n:2402_1: āgatakāle bahipākāre senaṃ parikkhipāpetvā gaṇhathetanti manusse niyojesi.
anya-e1101n:2402_3: Rājadhītā te disvā sīghaṃ sindhavaṃ upasaṅkamitvā tassa piṭṭhiyaṃ nisinnā paṇhiyā saññaṃ adāsi.
anya-e1101n:2402_4: So taṃ gahetvā vegena ākāsaṃ pakkhandi.
anya-e1101n:2402_5: Sā pana dunnisinnabhāvena assassa vegaṃ sandhāretumasakkontī assapiṭṭhito parigali.
anya-e1101n:2402_6: Sindhavo rājadhītaraṃ patamānaṃ disvā rājovādaṃ saramāno vegenāgantvā tassā kese ḍaṃsitvā ukkhipitvā
anya-e1101n:2402_7: patamānāya tassā piṭṭhiṃdatvā nisīdāpetvā ākāsena taṃ netvā pāṭaliputtanagareyeva patiṭṭhāpesi pātaliputtanagareyevataṃ
anya-e1101n:2405_0: Na jahantīti mantvāna, kataññū hontu hontipāṇino-itipikatthaci pāṇinoti.
anya-e1101n:2406_0: Tato paṭṭhāya sā puññakammaṃ katvā saggaparāyanā ahosīti.
anya-e1101n:2414_1: tattha tissavihāraṃ nāma anekasatabhikkhūhi samākiṇṇaṃ anekapariveṇapatimaṇḍitaṃ vihāraṃ ahosi.
anya-e1101n:2414_3: So ekasmiṃsamaye janapadacārikaṃ caranto pāsāṇavāpigāme bhikkhaṃ caritvā yāpanamattaṃ bhattaṃ sappinā
anya-e1101n:2414_4: saddhiṃ labhitvā nikkhamma gāmadvāraṃ patvā mahāgāmābhimukho gacchanto manusse udakaphāsukaṭṭhānaṃ pucchi.
anya-e1101n:2414_5: Tehi bhante tumhākaṃ abhimukhe avidūraṭṭhāne kakubandakandaraṃ nāma sandamānasītalodakaṃ dhavalavālukātalaṃ
anya-e1101n:2414_6: tattha tumhe gantvā nahātvā sītalacchāyāya vālukātale nisinno bhattakiccaṃ katvā gacchathāti vutte sāmaṇero
anya-e1101n:2414_7: sādhūti vatvā tattha gantvā phāsukaṭṭhāne nisinno bhattaṃ bhuñjitumārabhi.
anya-e1101n:2414_8: Tadā ekena vanakammikena saddhiṃaraññaṃ gatā ekā sunakhī tasmiṃ kandare ekasmiṃ pabbhāraṭṭhāne dārake
anya-e1101n:2414_9: vijāyitvā chātajjhattā pavedhamānagattā dārakānaṃ samīpenipannā sāmaṇerassa patte āhāragandhaṃ ghāyitvā
anya-e1101n:2414_10: nipannaṭṭhānato vuṭṭhāya pavedhamānā tassa samīpaṃ āgamma naṅguṭṭhaṃ cālentī aṭṭhāsi,
anya-e1101n:2414_11: sāmaṇero taṃ disvā kampitamānaso attano bhojanatthāya vaṭṭitaṃ pathamālopaṃ tassā purato ṭhapesi,
anya-e1101n:2414_13: Taṃ disvā tuṭṭho punappunaṃ ālopaṃ karonto tassā bhattaṃ datvā pattaṃ dhovitvā thavikāya pakkhipitvā agamāsi.
anya-e1101n:2414_14: Tato sā sunakhī sāmaṇeragatena pasādena tato cutā jambudīpe devaputtanagare rājānaṃ paṭicca tassa mahesiyā
anya-e1101n:2414_15: kucchimhi paṭisandhiṃ gaṇhitvā dasamāsaccayena mātukucchito nikkhami,
anya-e1101n:2414_16: athassā sikhāmaṅgaladivase sampatte mātāpitaro panassā kuṇḍalāvaṭṭakesattā kuṇḍalāti nāma makaṃsu.
anya-e1101n:2414_18: tasmiṃ kira samaye tisso sāmaṇero mahābodhiṃ vandissāmīti nāvaṃ abhiruyha jambudīpaṃ gantvā anupubbena
anya-e1101n:2414_19: devaputtanagaraṃ patvā sunivattho supāruto yugamattadaso bhikkhāya caranto mahāvīthiṃ sampāpuṇi.
anya-e1101n:2414_20: Rājadhītā sīhapañjaraṃ ugghāṭetvā antaravīthiṃ olokentī bhikkhantaṃ sāmaṇeraṃ disvā pubbasinehaṃ paṭilabhi,
anya-e1101n:2414_22: Sā kira pubbe bhikkhuṇī hutvā paṇṇasūciyā saddhiṃ potthakañca padīpiyatelañca datvā jātissarā bhaveyyaṃti patthanaṃ ṭhapesi,
anya-e1101n:2414_23: tato sājātiṃ anussarantī sāmaṇerena attano katūpakāraṃ ditvā somanassā naṃ pakkosāpetvā rājagehe āsanaṃ
anya-e1101n:2414_24: paññāpetvā tattha nisinnaṃ nānaggarasa bhojanena parivisitvā onītapattapāṇiṃ sāmaṇeraṃ upasaṅkamitvā
anya-e1101n:2414_25: vanditvā ekamantaṃ nisinnā tena saddhiṃ sallapantī evamāha.
anya-e1101n:2416_0: Na sañjānāsi maṃ dhīra, pubbehaṃ tava dāsikā;
anya-e1101n:2417_0: Tenāhaṃ sukhitā āsiṃ, tasmā tvamasi issaroti.
anya-e1101n:2420_0: Natthi me tādisī dāsī, na sañjānāmi taṃ ahaṃ;
anya-e1101n:2421_0: Kāsi tvaṃ kassa vā dhītā, taṃ me akkhāhi pucchitāti.
anya-e1101n:2424_0: Sārāpemi tuvaṃ ajja, yathā jānāsimaṃ ise;
anya-e1101n:2436_0: Disvā taṃ maṃ tadā bhante, vedhamānaṃ bubhukkhitaṃ;
anya-e1101n:2437_0: Chinnabhatto tuvaṃ hutvā, mamaṃ bhattena tosayī.
anya-e1101n:2446_0: Kīdisaṃ hoti sambuddhe, pasādena phalaṃ aho.
anya-e1101n:2450_0: Evaṃ sāmaṇerena katūpakāraṃ sārāpetvā bhante tava dāsiyā anuggahaṃ paṭicca idheva vasathāti nimantitvā
anya-e1101n:2450_1: tena sampaṭicchite mahantaṃ vihāraṃ kārāpetvā sāmaṇeraṃ ādiṃ katvā anekabhikkhusate nimantetvā vihāre
anya-e1101n:2450_3: Sāmaṇeropi sunakhiyā dinnadānaṃ anussaritvā tuṭṭho buddhānussatiṃ manasikaronto na cirenava arahattaṃ
anya-e1101n:2450_4: patvā tasmiṃyeva vihāre vasanto āyupariyosāne tattheva parinibbāyīti.
